## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-115">ARP önbelleğindeki tüm dinamik girdileri geçersiz kıl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-116">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-117">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-118">Bu hizmet, şu anda ARP önbelleğindeki tüm dinamik ARP girdilerini geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-119">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-120">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-121">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP önbelleği geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) çağıran bir iş parçacığı değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-126">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-127">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-128">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-129">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-130">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-148">Dinamik ARP girdisi ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-149">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-150">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-151">Bu hizmet ARP önbelleğinden dinamik bir giriş ayırır ve belirtilen IP 'yi fiziksel adres eşlemesi olarak ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-152">Sıfır fiziksel adresi belirtilmişse, fiziksel adresin çözülebilmesi için ağa gerçek bir ARP isteği gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-153">Ayrıca, ARP eskime etkin olduğunda veya ARP önbelleği tükenirse ve en son kullanılan ARP girişi ise bu girişin kaldırılacağını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-154">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-155">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-156">**ip_address** Eşlenecek IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-157">**physical_msw** Fiziksel adresin ilk 16 bit (47-32).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-158">**physical_lsw** Fiziksel adresin düşük 32 bitleri (31-0).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-159">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP dinamik giriş kümesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) ARP önbelleğinde daha fazla ARP girişi bulunmamaktadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-166">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-167">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-168">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-169">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-170">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-188">Adres Çözümleme protokolünü (ARP) etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-189">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-190">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-191">Bu hizmet, belirli IP örneği için NetX Duo ARP bileşenini başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-192">ARP başlatma, ARP iletilerinin gönderilmesi ve alınması için gereken ARP önbelleğini ve çeşitli ARP işleme yordamlarını ayarlamayı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-193">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-194">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-195">**arp_cache_memory** ARP önbelleğinin yerleştirileceği bellek alanı işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-196">**arp_cache_size** Her ARP girişi 52 bayttır, ARP girişlerinin toplam sayısı, bu nedenle boyut 52 ' ye bölünür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-197">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya önbellek bellek işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan ARP önbelleği belleği çok küçük.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Bu bileşen zaten etkinleştirilmiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-203">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-203">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-204">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-204">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-205">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-205">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-206">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-206">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-207">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-207">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_enable(&ip_0, (void *) pointer, 1024);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-225">Bir ARP girişini silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-226">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-227">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-228">Bu hizmet, verilen IP adresi için bir ARP girişini IP iç ARP tablosundan kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-229">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-230">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-231">**ip_address** Belirtilen IP adresine sahip ARP girişi silinmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-232">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) belirtilen IP adresine sahip hiçbir giriş bulunamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya önbellek bellek işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) belirtilen IP adresi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-238">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-239">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-240">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-241">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-242">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-260">Gereksiz ARP isteği gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-261">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-262">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-263">Bu hizmet, arabirim IP adresi geçerli olduğu sürece gereksiz ARP isteklerini iletmek için tüm fiziksel arabirimlerin üzerinden geçer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-264">Bir ARP yanıtı alındıktan sonra, sağlanan yanıt işleyicisi, gereksiz ARP için yanıtı işlemek üzere çağırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-265">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-266">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-267">**response_handler** Yanıt işleme işlevine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-268">NX_NULL sağlanırsa, yanıtlar yok sayılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-269">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı gereksiz ARP gönderme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) kullanılabilir paket yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçerli IP adresi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) çağıran bir iş parçacığı değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-276">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-277">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-278">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-279">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-280">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-298">Bir IP adresi verilen fiziksel donanım adresini bulma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-299">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-300">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-301">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP adresiyle ilişkili ARP önbelleğinde fiziksel bir donanım adresi bulmaya çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-302">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-303">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-304">**ip_address** Aranacak IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-305">**physical_msw** Fiziksel adresin ilk 16 bitini (47-32) döndürmek için değişkene yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-306">**physical_lsw** Fiziksel adresin alt 32 bitlerini (31-0) döndürmek için değişkene yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-307">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP donanım adresi bul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP hardware address find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) eşleme ARP önbelleğinde bulunamadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya bellek işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-314">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-315">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-316">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-316">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-317">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-317">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-318">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-318">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                      &physical_msw,
                                      &physical_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables physical_msw and
   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-336">ARP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-337">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-338">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-339">Bu hizmet, ilişkili IP örneği için ARP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-340">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-341">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-342">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-343">**arp_requests_sent** Bu IP örneğinden gönderilen toplam ARP isteği için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-344">**arp_requests_received** Ağdan alınan toplam ARP istekleri için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-345">**arp_responses_sent** Bu IP örneğinden gönderilen toplam ARP yanıtlarının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-346">**arp_responses_received** Ağdan alınan toplam ARP yanıtlarının hedefe yönelik işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Geçerli dinamik ARP girişi sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-348">**arp_static_entries** Geçerli statik ARP girişi sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-349">**arp_aged_entries** Eski olan ve geçersiz duruma gelen toplam ARP girişi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Alınan toplam geçersiz ARP iletisi hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-351">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP bilgisi alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-356">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-357">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-358">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-359">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-360">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-378">Fiziksel bir adres verilen IP adresini bulma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-379">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-380">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-381">Bu hizmet, ARP önbelleğinde sağlanan fiziksel adresle ilişkili bir IP adresi bulmaya çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-382">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-383">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-384">**ip_address** Eşlenen IP adresi işaretçisi, eşlenmiş bir değer bulundu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-385">**physical_msw** Aranacak fiziksel adresin ilk 16 bit (47-32).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-386">**physical_lsw** Aranacak fiziksel adresin düşük 32 bitleri (31-0).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-387">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-387">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-398">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-416">Tüm statik ARP girdilerini Sil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-417">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-418">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-419">Bu hizmet ARP önbelleğindeki tüm statik girişleri siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-420">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-421">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-422">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) statik girdileri silinir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz ip_ptr işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-427">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-428">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-429">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-430">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-431">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-449">ARP önbelleğinde donanım eşlemeye statik IP oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-450">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-451">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-452">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için ARP önbelleğinde statik bir IP-fiziksel adres eşlemesi oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-453">Statik ARP girdileri ARP düzenli güncelleştirmelerine tabi değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-454">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-455">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-456">**ip_address** Eşlenecek IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-457">**physical_msw** Eşlenecek fiziksel adresin ilk 16 bit (47-32).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-458">**physical_lsw** Eşlenecek fiziksel adresin düşük 32 bitleri (31-0).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-459">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP statik girdisi oluştur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) ARP önbelleğinde daha fazla ARP girişi bulunmamaktadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw ve physical_lsw ikisi de 0 ' dır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-467">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-468">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-469">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-470">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-471">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-489">ARP önbelleğindeki statik IP 'yi donanım eşleştirmeye silme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,

    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-491">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-492">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için ARP önbelleğinde önceden oluşturulmuş bir statik IP-fiziksel adres eşlemeyi bulur ve siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-493">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-494">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-495">**ip_address** Statik olarak eşlenmiş IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-496">**physical_msw** Statik olarak eşlenmiş fiziksel adresin ilk 16 bit (47-\* \* 32).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-497">**physical_lsw** Statik olarak eşlenmiş fiziksel adresin düşük 32 bitleri (31-\* \* 0).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-498">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ARP statik girdisi silme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) ARP ÖNBELLEĞINDE statik ARP girdisi bulunamadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw ve physical_lsw ikisi de 0 ' dır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-506">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-507">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-508">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-509">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-510">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-510">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-528">Internet Denetim Iletisi Protokolü 'Nü (ıCMP) etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-529">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-530">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-531">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için ıCMP bileşenini sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-532">ICMP bileşeni, Internet hata iletilerini ve ping isteklerini ve yanıtlarını işlemekten sorumludur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-533">*Bu hizmet yalnızca IPv4 hizmeti IÇIN ICMP 'yi sunar. Hem Icmpv4 hem de ICMPv6 'yı etkinleştirmek için uygulamalar **nxd_icmp_enable** hizmetini kullanır*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-534">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-535">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-536">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ICMP etkinleştirmesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP zaten etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-541">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-542">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-543">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-544">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-545">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-545">Example</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-554">ICMP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-555">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-556">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-557">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için ıCMP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-558">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-559">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-560">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-561">**pings_sent** Gönderilen toplam ping sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-562">**ping_timeouts** Toplam ping zaman aşımı sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Ping isteklerinde askıya alınan toplam iş parçacığı sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-564">**ping_responses_received** Alınan toplam ping yanıtı sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Toplam ıCMP sağlama toplamı hatası sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** İşlenmemiş ıCMP iletilerinin toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-567">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ICMP bilgisi alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-572">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-573">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-574">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-575">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-576">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-585">Belirtilen IP adresine ping isteği gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-586">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-587">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-588">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP adresine bir ping isteği gönderir ve bir ping yanıtı iletisi için belirtilen süre için bekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-589">Yanıt alınmadığında bir hata döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-590">Aksi takdirde, tüm yanıt iletisi response_ptr tarafından işaret edilen değişkende döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-591">Bir IPv6 hedefine ping isteği göndermek için, uygulamalar ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ veya _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** hizmetini kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-592">*NX_SUCCESS döndürülürse, uygulama artık gerekli olmadığında alınan paketi serbest bırakmaktan sorumludur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-593">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-594">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-595">**ip_address** Ping yapılacak ana bilgisayar bayt sırasındaki IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-596">**veri** Ping iletisi için veri alanı işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-597">**data_size** Ping verilerinde bayt sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-598">**response_ptr** İçindeki ping yanıt iletisini döndürecek paket işaretçisi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-599">**wait_option** Bir ping yanıtı için beklenecek ThreadX süreölçer sayaç sayısını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-600">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-601">Wait seçeneği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-602">Değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-604">0xC0000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-605">ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-606">(0x00000001 aracılığıyla 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-608">Ffffffff</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-609">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-611">Yanıt iletisi işaretçisi, response_ptr tarafından işaret edilen değişkene yerleştirildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) bir ping isteği paketi ayrılamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) belirtilen veri alanı, bu IP örneği için varsayılan paket boyutunu aşıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) istenen IP yanıt vermedi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya Yanıt işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-620">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-620">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-621">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-622">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-623">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-624">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-632">nx_igmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-632">nx_igmp_enable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-634">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-634">Prototype</span></span>

```c
UINT nx_igmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-635">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-635">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-636">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneğindeki ıGMP bileşenini sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-636">This service enables the IGMP component on the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-637">IGMP bileşeni, IP çok noktaya yayın grup yönetimi işlemlerine yönelik destek sağlamaktan sorumludur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-637">The IGMP component is responsible for providing support for IP multicast group management operations.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarıyla IGMP etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Bu bileşen zaten etkinleştirilmiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-645">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-645">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-646">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-646">Initialization, threads</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-663">IGMP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-663">Retrieve information about IGMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-664">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-664">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *igmp_reports_sent,
    ULONG *igmp_queries_received,
    ULONG *igmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *current_groups_joined);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-665">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-665">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-666">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için ıGMP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-666">This service retrieves information about IGMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-667">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-667">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-668">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-669">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-669">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Gönderilen toplam ıCMP raporu sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of ICMP reports sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-671">**igmp_queries_received** Çok noktaya yayın yönlendiricisi tarafından alınan toplam sorgu sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-671">**igmp_queries_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of queries received by multicast router.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Alma paketlerindeki toplam ıGMP sağlama toplamı hatalarının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of IGMP checksum errors on receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-673">**current_groups_joined** Bu IP örneğine katılmış geçerli grup sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-673">**current_groups_joined** Pointer to destination of the current number of groups joined through this IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-674">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-674">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarıyla IGMP bilgileri alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-679">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-679">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-680">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-680">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-681">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-681">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-682">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-682">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-683">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-683">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IGMP information from previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_info_get(&ip_0, &igmp_reports_sent,
                          &igmp_queries_received,
                          &igmp_checksum_errors,
                          &current_groups_joined);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP information was retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
