## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-754">IP örneğini bir arabirim aracılığıyla belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubuna ekleyin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-754">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-755">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-755">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-756">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-756">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-757">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla bir IP örneğini belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubuna birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-757">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-758">Aynı grubun kaç kez katıldığını izlemek için bir iç sayaç tutulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-758">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-759">Çok noktaya yayın grubuna katıldıktan sonra, ıGMP bileşeni, belirtilen ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla bu grup adresiyle IP paketlerinin alımına ve ayrıca bu IP 'nin bu çok noktaya yayın grubunun bir üyesi olduğu yönlendiricilere rapor vermeyecektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-759">After joining the multicast group, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address via the specified network interface and also report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-760">IGMP üyelik birleşimi, rapor ve çıkış iletileri belirtilen ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla da gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-760">The IGMP membership join, report, and leave messages are also sent via the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-761">Bir IPv4 çok noktaya yayın grubuna ıGMP grup üyeliği raporu göndermeden katmak için, uygulama hizmeti ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join*** kullanacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-761">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-762">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-762">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-763">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-763">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-764">**group_address** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde katılacak sınıf D IP çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-764">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-765">**interface_index** NetX Duo örneğine iliştirilmiş arabirimin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-765">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-766">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok noktaya yayın grubu katılımı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) daha fazla çok noktaya yayın grubu birleştirilemez, en fazla sınır aşıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) cihaz dizini geçersiz bir ağ arabirimine işaret ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi geçerli bir sınıf D adresi değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP çok noktaya yayın desteği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-774">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-775">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-776">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-776">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-777">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-777">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-778">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-778">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   244.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-791">Belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubunu bir arabirim aracılığıyla bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-791">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-792">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-792">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-793">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-794">Bu hizmet belirtilen ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubunu bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-794">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-795">Bir iç sayaç, aynı grubun bir üyesinin kaç kez bir üyesi olduğunu izlemek için tutulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-795">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been a member of.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-796">Çok noktaya yayın grubundan ayrıldıktan sonra, ıGMP bileşeni uygun üyelik raporunu gönderir ve bu düğümden üye yoksa gruptan ayrılamayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-796">After leaving the multicast group, the IGMP component will send out proper membership report, and may leave the group if there are no members from this node.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-797">Bir IPv4 çok noktaya yayın grubunu ıGMP grup üyeliği raporu göndermeden bırakmak için, uygulama hizmeti ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave*** kullanacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-797">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-798">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-798">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-799">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-799">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-800">**group_address** Bırakılacak sınıf D IP çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-800">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-801">IP adresi ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-801">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-802">**interface_index** NetX Duo örneğine iliştirilmiş arabirimin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-802">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-803">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-803">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok noktaya yayın grubu katılımı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi yerel çok noktaya yayın tablosunda bulunamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) cihaz dizini geçersiz bir ağ arabirimine işaret ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi geçerli bir sınıf D adresi değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP çok noktaya yayın desteği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-811">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-812">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-812">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-813">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-813">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-814">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-814">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-815">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-815">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-828">IP örneğini belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubuna ekleyin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-828">Join IP instance to specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-829">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-829">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-830">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-830">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-831">Bu hizmet, bir IP örneğini belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubuna birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-831">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-832">Aynı grubun kaç kez katıldığını izlemek için bir iç sayaç tutulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-832">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-833">Bu, konağın gruba katılması için bir ağ üzerinde ilk JOIN isteği olduğunu belirten bir ıGMP raporu göndermek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-833">The driver is commanded to send an IGMP report if this is the first join request out on the network indicating the host's intention to join the group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-834">Birleştirme sonrasında, ıGMP bileşeni, bu IP 'nin bu çok noktaya yayın grubunun üyesi olduğu yönlendiricilerle bu grup adresi ve raporla IP paketleri alımına izin verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-834">After joining, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address and report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-835">Bir IPv4 çok noktaya yayın grubuna ıGMP grup üyeliği raporu göndermeden katmak için, uygulama hizmeti ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join*** kullanacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-835">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-836">*Birincil olmayan bir cihazdaki çok noktaya yayın grubuna katmak için, hizmet **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join kullanın.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-836">*To join a multicast group on a non-primary device, use the service **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-837">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-838">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-838">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-839">**group_address** Katılacak sınıf D IP çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-839">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-840">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-840">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok noktaya yayın grubu katılımı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) daha fazla çok noktaya yayın grubu birleştirilemez, en fazla sınır aşıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) cihaz dizini geçersiz bir ağ arabirimine işaret ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP grubu adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-848">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-849">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-849">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-851">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-852">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance ip_0 joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200. */

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully
   joined the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-868">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-869">Bu hizmet, equests sayısı, JOIN isteklerinin sayısı ile eşleşiyorsa bir IP örneğinin belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubunu bırakmasını sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-869">This service causes an IP instance to leave the specified multicast group, if the number of leave equests matches the number of join requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-870">Aksi takdirde, iç ekleme sayısı yalnızca azaltılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-870">Otherwise, the internal join count is simply decremented.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-871">Bir IPv4 çok noktaya yayın grubunu ıGMP grup üyeliği raporu göndermeden bırakmak için, uygulama hizmeti ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave*** kullanacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-871">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-872">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-873">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-873">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-874">**group_address** Bırakılacak çok noktaya yayın grubu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-874">**group_address** Multicast group to leave.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-875">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-875">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok noktaya yayın grubu katılımı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) önceki JOIN isteği bulunamadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Previous join request was not found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) cihaz dizini geçersiz bir ağ arabirimine işaret ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP grubu adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-884">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-884">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-887">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-887">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Cause IP instance to leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_leave(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully left
   the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_change_notifiy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-901">IP adresi değişirse uygulamayı bilgilendir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-901">Notify application if IP address changes</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-902">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-902">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*change_notify)(NX_IP *, VOID *),
    VOID *additional_info);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-903">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-904">Bu hizmet, IPv4 adresi her değiştirildiğinde çağrılan bir uygulama bildirim işlevini kaydeder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-904">This service registers an application notification function that is called whenever the IPv4 address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-905">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-906">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-906">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-907">**change_notify** IP değişikliği bildirim işlevine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-907">**change_notify** Pointer to IP change notification function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-908">Bu parametre NX_NULL, IP adresi değişiklik bildirimi devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-908">If this parameter is NX_NULL, IP address change notification is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-909">**additional_info** IP adresi değiştirildiğinde bildirim işlevine de sağlanan isteğe bağlı ek bilgilere yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-909">**additional_info** Pointer to optional additional information that is also supplied to the notification function when the IP address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-910">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-910">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP adresi değişikliği bildirimi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address change notification.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-914">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-915">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-915">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-916">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-916">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-917">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-918">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-918">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Register the function "my_ip_changed" to be called whenever the
   IP address is changed. */
status = nx_ip_address_change_notify(&ip_0, my_ip_changed,
                                      NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "my_ip_changed" function will be
   called whenever the IP address changes. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-943">nx_ip_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-943">nx_ip_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-944">IPv4 adresi ve ağ maskesini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-944">Retrieve IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-945">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-945">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-946">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-946">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-947">Bu hizmet, birincil ağ arabiriminin IPv4 adresini ve alt ağ maskesini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-947">This service retrieves IPv4 address and its subnet mask of the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]   
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-948">\* İkincil cihaz hakkında bilgi edinmek için \* \* nx_ip_interface_address_get \* \* \* hizmetini kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-948">\*To obtain information of the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-949">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-949">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-950">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-950">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-951">**ip_address** IP adresi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-951">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-952">**network_mask** Ağ maskesi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-952">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-953">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-953">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP adresi al.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya dönüş değişkeni işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return variable pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-957">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-958">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-958">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-959">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-959">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-960">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-960">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-961">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-961">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the IP address and network mask from the previously created
   IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address, &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address and
   network_mask contain the IP and network mask respectively. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-986">nx_ip_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-986">nx_ip_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-987">IPv4 adresi ve ağ maskesini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-987">Set IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-988">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-989">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-990">Bu hizmet, birincil ağ arabirimi için IPv4 adresi ve ağ maskesini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-990">This service sets IPv4 address and network mask for the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-991">\* İkincil cihaz için IP adresi ve ağ maskesini ayarlamak için \* \* nx_ip_interface_address_set \* \* \* hizmetini kullanın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-991">\*To set IP address and network mask for the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-992">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-992">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-993">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-993">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-994">**ip_address** Yeni IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-994">**ip_address** New IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-995">**network_mask** Yeni ağ maskesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-995">**network_mask** New network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-996">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP adresi kümesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1001">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1002">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1002">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1003">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1003">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1004">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1004">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1005">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1005">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the IP address and network mask to 1.2.3.4 and 0xFFFFFF00 for
   the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                           0xFFFFFF00UL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now has an IP address of
   1.2.3.4 and a network mask of 0xFFFFFF00. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1031">Yardımcı paket havuzu yapılandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1031">Configure an auxiliary packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1032">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1032">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *aux_pool);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1033">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1034">Bu hizmet, IP örneğinde bir yardımcı paket havuzu yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1034">This service configures an auxiliary packet pool in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1035">Bellek kısıtlı bir sistem için, Kullanıcı varsayılan paket havuzunu MTU paket boyutuyla oluşturup, ile küçük paketleri iletmek için IP iş parçacığı için daha küçük bir paket havuzu oluşturarak bellek verimliliğini artırabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1035">For a memory-constrained system, the user may increase memory efficiency by creating the default packet pool with packet size of MTU, and creating an auxiliary packet pool with smaller packet size for the IP thread to transmit small packets with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1036">Yardımcı havuz için önerilen paket boyutu 256 bayttır, bu da IPv6 ve IPSec 'in her ikisinin de etkin olduğu varsayılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1036">The recommended packet size for the auxiliary pool is 256 bytes, assuming IPv6 and IPsec are both enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1037">Varsayılan olarak, IP örneği yardımcı paket havuzunu kabul etmez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1037">By default the IP instance does not accept the auxiliary packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1038">Bu özelliği etkinleştirmek için, NetX Duo kitaplığı derlenirken *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* tanımlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1038">To enable this feature, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* must be defined when compiling the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1039">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1040">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1040">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1041">**aux_pool** IP örneği için yapılandırılacak yardımcı paket havuzu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1041">**aux_pool** The auxiliary packet pool to be configured for the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1042">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1042">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP adresi kümesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) çift paket havuzu özelliği kitaplıkta derlenmiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The dual packet pool feature is not compiled in the library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi veya havuz işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1047">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1047">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1048">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1048">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1049">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1049">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1050">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1050">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1051">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1051">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE 256
NX_PACKET small_pool;

nx_packet_pool_create(&small_pool, "small pool", SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE,
                       small_pool_memory_ptr, small_pool_size);

/* Add the small packet pool to the IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(&ip_0, &small_pool);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now is able to use the
   small pool for transmitting small datagram. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1065">nx_ip_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1065">nx_ip_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1066">IP örneği oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1066">Create an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1067">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1067">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *name, ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask, 
    NX_PACKET_POOL *default_pool,
    VOID (*ip_network_driver)(NX_IP_DRIVER *),
    VOID *memory_ptr, 
    ULONG memory_size,
    UINT priority);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1068">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1069">Bu hizmet, Kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan IP adresi ve ağ sürücüsüne sahip bir IP örneği oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1069">This service creates an IP instance with the user supplied IP address and network driver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1070">Ayrıca, uygulamanın, iç paket ayırması için kullanacağı IP örneği için önceden oluşturulmuş bir paket havuzu sağlaması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1070">In addition, the application must supply a previously created packet pool for the IP instance to use for internal packet allocation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1071">Sağlanan uygulama ağ sürücüsünün bu IP iş parçacığı yürütülene kadar çağrılmadığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1071">Note that the supplied application network driver is not called until this IP's thread executes.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1072">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1073">**ip_ptr** Yeni bir IP örneği oluşturmak için denetim bloğu işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1073">**ip_ptr** Pointer to control block to create a new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1074">**ad** Bu yeni IP örneğinin adı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1074">**name** Name of this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1075">**ip_address** Bu yeni IP örneğinin IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1075">**ip_address** IP address for this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1076">**network_mask** Alt ağ ve süper netme kullanımları için IP adresinin ağ bölümünü maskelemek için maske.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1076">**network_mask** Mask to delineate the network portion of the IP address for sub-netting and super-netting uses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1077">**default_pool** Daha önce oluşturulmuş NetX Duo paket havuzunun denetim bloğuna yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1077">**default_pool** Pointer to control block of previously created NetX Duo packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1078">**ip_network_driver** IP paketleri göndermek ve almak için kullanılan Kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan ağ sürücüsü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1078">**ip_network_driver** User-supplied network driver used to send and receive IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1079">**memory_ptr** IP Yardımcısı iş parçacığının yığın alanı için bellek alanı işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1079">**memory_ptr** Pointer to memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1080">**memory_size** IP Yardımcısı iş parçacığı yığınının bellek alanındaki bayt sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1080">**memory_size** Number of bytes in the memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1081">**Öncelik** IP Yardımcısı iş parçacığının önceliği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1081">**priority** Priority of IP helper thread.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1082">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1082">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP örneği oluşturma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP instance creation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NETX Duo kitaplığı yanlış yapılandırılmış.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NetX Duo library is configured incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP, ağ sürücüsü işlev işaretçisi, paket havuzu veya bellek işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP, network driver function pointer, packet pool, or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) sağlanan yığın boyutu çok küçük.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) The supplied stack size is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) sağlanan IP adresi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) sağlanan IP iş parçacığı önceliği geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP thread priority is invalid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1091">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1091">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1094">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1094">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create an IP instance with an IP address of 1.2.3.4 and a network
   mask of 0xFFFFFF00UL. The "ethernet_driver" specifies the entry
   point of the application specific network driver and the
   "stack_memory_ptr" specifies the start of a 1024 byte memory
   area that is used for this IP instance’s helper thread. */
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance ip_0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0, ethernet_driver,
                      stack_memory_ptr, 1024, 1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been created. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1119">nx_ip_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1119">nx_ip_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1120">Önceden oluşturulan IP örneğini Sil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1120">Delete previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1121">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1121">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1122">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1123">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulmuş bir IP örneğini siler ve IP örneğinin sahip olduğu tüm sistem kaynaklarını serbest bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1123">This service deletes a previously created IP instance and releases all of the system resources owned by the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1124">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1124">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1125">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1125">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1126">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP silme işlemi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP deletion.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) bu IP örneğine, bağımlı UDP veya TCP yuvaları hala sahip.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) This IP instance still has UDP or TCP sockets bound to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1129">IP örneği silinmeden önce tüm yuvaların bağlantısı kesildi ve silinmemelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1129">All sockets must be unbound and deleted prior to deleting the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1135">Yes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1135">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1164">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1165">Bu hizmet, uygulamanın ***nx_ip_create*** çağrısı sırasında belirtilen birincil ağ arabirimi sürücüsüne doğrudan bir arabirim sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1165">This service provides a direct interface to the application's primary network interface driver specified during the ***nx_ip_create*** call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1166">Uygulamaya özgü komutlar, sayısal değerleri NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND daha büyük veya eşit bir değere göre kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1166">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1167">*İkincil cihaz için komut vermek üzere **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** hizmetini kullanın*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1167">*To issue command for the secondary device, use the **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** service*.</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1191">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1191">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */
status = nx_ip_driver_direct_command(&ip_0, NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                     &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1217">Ağ sürücüsüne komut verme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1217">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1218">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1218">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1219">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1220">Bu hizmet, IP örneğindeki uygulamanın ağ aygıtı sürücüsüne doğrudan bir komut sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1220">This service provides a direct command to the application's network device driver in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1221">Uygulamaya özgü komutlar, sayısal değerleri *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND* daha büyük veya eşit bir değere göre kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1221">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1222">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1222">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1223">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1223">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1224">**komut** Sayısal komut kodu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1224">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1225">Standart komutlar aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1225">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1234">**interface_index** Komutun gönderilmesi gereken ağ arabiriminin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1234">**interface_index** Index of the network interface the command should be sent to.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1235">**return_value_ptr** Çağıran değişkenin dönüş işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1235">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1236">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1236">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ağ sürücüsü doğrudan komutu başarıyla açıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) işlenmemiş veya uygulanmayan ağ sürücüsü komutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz arabirim dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya dönüş değeri işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1242">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1243">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1244">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1245">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1245">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1246">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */

/* Set the interface index to the primary device. */
UINT interface_index = 0;

status = nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(&ip_0,
                                               NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                               interface_index,
                                               &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1356">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1357">Bu hizmet, IPv4 ve IPv6 paketi fragmenting devre dışı bırakır ve işlevselliği yeniden birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1357">This service disables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1358">Yeniden birleştirilme bekleyen paketler için, bu hizmet bu paketleri yayınlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1358">For packets waiting to be reassembled, this service releases these packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1359">Bu hizmet, IP görevini oluştururken otomatik olarak devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1359">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1361">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1361">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1362">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1362">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP parçası devre dışı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1397">IP paketi fragmenting etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1397">Enable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1398">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1398">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1399">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1400">Bu hizmet, IPv4 ve IPv6 paketi fragmenting ve yeniden birleştirilen işlevselliği sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1400">This service enables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1401">Bu hizmet, IP görevini oluştururken otomatik olarak devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1401">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1402">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1402">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1403">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1403">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1404">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1404">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1405">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP parçası etkinleştirme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1405">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP parçalama özellikleri NETX Duo içine derlenmiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation features is not compiled into NetX Duo.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1409">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1409">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1410">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1410">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1411">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1411">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1412">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1412">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1413">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1413">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP fragmenting has been enabled on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1439">IPv4 ağ geçidi adresini temizle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1439">Clear the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1440">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1440">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1441">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1442">Bu hizmet, örnekte yapılandırılan IPv4 ağ geçidi adresini temizler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1443">IP örneğinden bir IPv6 varsayılan dıştaki öğesini temizlemek için uygulamalar hizmeti ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete kullanacaktır.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1444">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1444">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1445">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1445">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1446">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1446">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IP ağ geçidi adresini başarıyla temizledi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared the IP gateway address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetim bloğu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1450">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1451">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1451">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1452">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1452">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1453">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1453">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1454">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1454">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Clear the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   cleared from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1458">IPv4 ağ geçidi adresini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1458">Get the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1459">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1460">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1461">Bu hizmet, IP örneğinde yapılandırılan IPv4 ağ geçidi adresini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1462">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1463">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1463">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1464">**ip_address** Ağ Geçidi adresinin depolandığı belleğin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1464">**ip_address** Pointer to the memory where the gateway address is stored</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1465">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi veya IP adresi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or ip address pointer</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1487">Ağ geçidi IP adresi ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1487">Set Gateway IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1488">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1488">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1489">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1490">Bu hizmet, IPv4 ağ geçidi IP adresini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1491">Tüm ağ dışı trafik, iletim için bu ağ geçidine yönlendirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1492">Ağ geçidine ağ arabirimlerinden biri aracılığıyla doğrudan erişilebilir olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1493">IPv6 ağ geçidi adresini yapılandırmak için hizmeti nxd_ipv6_default_router_add kullanın ***.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1494">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1495">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1496">**ip_address** Ağ geçidinin IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1497">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı ağ geçidi IP adresi kümesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful Gateway IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1502">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1503">Başlatma, iş parçacığı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1503">Initialization, thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1504">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1504">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1505">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1505">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1506">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1506">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup the Gateway address for previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,99);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, all out-of-network send requests are
   routed to 1.2.3.99. */
```
