## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1519">IP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1519">Retrieve information about IP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1520">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1520">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1521">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1522">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için IP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1523">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1524">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1525">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1525">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Gönderilen IP paketlerinin toplam sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of IP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Gönderilen toplam bayt sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** IP alma paketlerinin toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Alınan IP baytlarının toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Toplam geçersiz IP paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Bırakılan toplam alım paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Alma paketlerindeki toplam sağlama toplamı hatalarının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of checksum errors in receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Bırakılan Toplam gönderme paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Gönderilen toplam parçacık sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Toplam alınan parçacık sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1536">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP bilgisi alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1540">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1541">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1541">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1542">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1542">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1543">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1543">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1544">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1570">Arabirim IP adresini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1571">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1572">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1573">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabiriminin IPv4 adresini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1574">Uygulama, IPv6 adresini almak için hizmeti kullanır ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1575">*Birincil cihaz değilse belirtilen cihaz, daha önce IP örneğine eklenmiş olmalıdır*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1576">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1577">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1578">**interface_index** Arabirim dizini, IP örneğine iliştirilmiş ağ arabiriminin diziniyle aynı değer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1579">**ip_address** Cihaz arabirimi IP adresi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1580">**network_mask** Cihaz arabirimi ağ maskesi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1581">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP adresi al.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) belirtilen ağ arabirimi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1586">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1587">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1588">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1589">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1590">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1605">Adres eşlemesinin gerekli olup olmadığını yapılandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1606">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1607">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1608">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabirimi için MAC adresi eşlemesinin IP adresinin gerekli olup olmadığını yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1609">Bu hizmet genellikle arabirim cihaz sürücüsünden, temel alınan arabirimde IP adresinin katman iki (MAC) adres eşlemesini gerektirip gerektirmediğini bildirmek için kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1610">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1611">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1612">**interface_index** Ağ arabiriminin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE--adres eşleme gerekli NX_FALSE--adres eşleme gerekli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1614">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yapılandırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) cihaz dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1619">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1620">İş Parçacığı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1621">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1622">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1623">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1638">Arabirim IP adresi ve ağ maskesini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1638">Set interface IP address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1639">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1639">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1640">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1640">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1641">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP arabirimi için IPv4 adresini ve ağ maskesini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1641">This service sets the IPv4 address and network mask for the specified IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1642">Uygulama, IPv6 arabirim adresini yapılandırmak için hizmeti ***nxd_ipv6_address_set*** kullanacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1642">To configure IPv6 interface address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span></span> 
 
> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1643">*Belirtilen arabirim daha önce IP örneğine eklenmiş olmalıdır*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1643">*The specified interface must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1644">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1644">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1646">**interface_index** NetX Duo örneğine iliştirilmiş arabirimin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1646">**interface_index** Index of the interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1647">**ip_address** Yeni ağ arabirimi IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1647">**ip_address** New network interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1648">**network_mask** Yeni Arabirim ağ maskesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1648">**network_mask** New interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1649">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1650">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP adresi kümesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1650">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) belirtilen ağ arabirimi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1659">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1659">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Set device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_set(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     ip_address,
                                     network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface IP address and mask was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1674">Ağ arabirimini IP örneğine Ekle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1674">Attach network interface to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1675">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1675">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_attach(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *interface_name,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask,
    VOID(*ip_link_driver)(struct NX_IP_DRIVER_STRUCT *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1676">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1677">Bu hizmet, IP arabirimine bir fiziksel ağ arabirimi ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1677">This service adds a physical network interface to the IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1678">Bu durumda, her ek arabirimin birincil arabirime ikincil olması için, IP örneğinin birincil arabirimle oluşturulduğunu aklınızda bulunur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1678">Note the IP instance is created with the primary interface so each additional interface is secondary to the primary interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1679">IP örneğine (birincil arabirim dahil) bağlı olan ağ arabirimlerinin toplam sayısı **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** aşamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1679">The total number of network interfaces attached to the IP instance (including the primary interface) cannot exceed **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1680">IP iş parçacığı henüz çalışmıyorsa, ikincil arabirimler tüm fiziksel arabirimleri Başlatan IP iş parçacığı başlatma sürecinin bir parçası olarak başlatılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1680">If the IP thread has not been running yet, the secondary interfaces will be initialized as part of the IP thread startup process that initializes all physical interfaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1681">IP iş parçacığı henüz çalışmıyorsa, ikincil arabirim ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** hizmetin bir parçası olarak başlatılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1681">If the IP thread is not running yet, the secondary interface is initialized as part of the ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1682">*ip_ptr geçerli bir NetX Duo IP yapısına işaret etmelidir. IP örneği için ağ arabirimlerinin sayısı için **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** yapılandırılması gerekir. Varsayılan değer bir değeridir*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1682">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** must be configured for the number of network interfaces for the IP instance. The default value is one*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1683">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1683">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1684">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1684">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1685">**interface_name** Arabirim adı dizesinin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1685">**interface_name** Pointer to interface name string.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1686">**ip_address** Konak bayt düzeninde cihaz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1686">**ip_address** Device IP address in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1687">**network_mask** Konak bayt düzeninde cihaz ağ maskesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1687">**network_mask** Device network mask in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1688">**ip_link_driver** Arabirim için Ethernet sürücüsü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet driver for the interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1689">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1689">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) girişi statik yönlendirme tablosuna eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) en fazla arabirim sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Max number of interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES aşıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1693">IPv6 etkinse, bu hata sürücünün IPv6 çok noktaya yayın işlemlerini işlemek için yeterli kaynak olmadığını da belirtebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1693">If IPv6 is enabled, this error may also indicate that the driver may not have enough resource to handle IPv6 multicast operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) sağlanan IP adresı bu IP örneğinde zaten kullanılıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi girişi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi girişi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address input.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1698">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1699">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1699">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1700">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1700">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1701">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1701">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1702">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1702">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Attach secondary device for device IP address 192.168.1.68 with
   the specified Ethernet driver. */
status = nx_ip_interface_attach(ip_ptr, “secondary_port”,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,68),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                nx_etherDriver);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface was successfully added to
   the IP instance interface table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1717">Arabirim donanım özelliğini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1717">Get interface hardware capability</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1718">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1718">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *interface_capability_flag);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1719">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1720">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabiriminden yetenek bayrağını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1720">This service retrieves the capability flag from the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1721">Bu hizmeti kullanmak için NetX Duo kitaplığı, ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** etkinleştirilmiş seçeneği ile oluşturulmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1721">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1722">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1722">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1723">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1723">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1724">**interface_index** Ağ arabiriminin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1724">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Yetenek bayrağı için bellek alanı işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pointer to memory space for the capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1726">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1726">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) arabirim yetenek bilgilerini başarıyla aldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully obtained interface capability information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) arabirimi yetenek özelliği bu derlemede desteklenmiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok Işaretçisi veya geçersiz yetenek bayrak işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or Invalid capability flag pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1732">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1733">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1733">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1734">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1735">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1736">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1736">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       capability_flag;

/* Get the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_get(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        &capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the capability flag from the primary
   interface was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1751">Donanım özelliği bayrağını ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1751">Set the hardware capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1752">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1752">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG interface_capability_flag);
```                           
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1753">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1753">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1754">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabirimi için yetenek bayrağını yapılandırmak üzere ağ aygıtı sürücüsü tarafından kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1754">This service is used by the network device driver to configure the capability flag for a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1755">Bu hizmeti kullanmak için NetX Duo Kitaplığı ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** tanımlanmış seçenekle derlenmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1755">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be compiled with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1756">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1756">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1757">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1757">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1758">**interface_index** Ağ arabiriminin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1758">**interface_index** Index of network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Çıkış için yetenek bayrağı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Capability flag for output</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1760">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface donanım özelliği bayrağını başarıyla ayarladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set interface hardware capability flag.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) arabirimi yetenek özelliği bu derlemede desteklenmiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S Hizm, sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1766">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1766">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1767">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1767">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1768">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1768">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1769">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1769">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1770">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1770">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG capability_flag = \
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_TX_CHECKSUM |\
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_RX_CHECKSUM;
UINT device_index = 0;

/* Set the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_set(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the hardware capability flag was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1785">Belirtilen arabirimi IP örneğinden ayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1785">Detach the specified interface from the IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1786">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1786">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1787">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1788">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP arabirimini IP örneğinden ayırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1788">This service detaches the specified IP interface from the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1789">Bir arabirim ayrıldıktan sonra, bu arabirim için tüm bağlı TCP yuvaları kapalı ve ND Cache ve ARP girdileri ilgili tablolarından kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1789">Once an interface is detached, all connected TCP sockets closed, and ND cache and ARP entries for this interface are removed from their respective tables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1790">Bu arabirim için ıGMP üyelikleri kaldırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1790">IGMP memberships for this interface are removed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1791">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1791">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1792">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1792">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1793">**Dizin** Kaldırılacak arabirimin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1793">**index** Index of the interface to be removed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1794">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) fiziksel arabirimi başarıyla kaldırdı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed a physical interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) belirtilen ağ arabirimi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1798">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1799">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1799">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1800">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1800">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1801">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1801">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1802">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1802">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Detach interface 1. */
status = nx_ip_interface_detach(&IP_0, INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface is successfully detached
   from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1817">Ağ arabirimi parametrelerini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1817">Retrieve network interface parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1818">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1818">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    CHAR **interface_name,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask,
    ULONG *mtu_size,
    ULONG *physical_address_msw,
    ULONG *physical_address_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1819">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1820">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabirimi için ağ parametreleriyle ilgili bilgileri alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1820">This service retrieves information on network parameters for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1821">Tüm veriler ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1821">All data are retrieved in host byte order.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1822">*ip_ptr geçerli bir NetX Duo IP yapısına işaret etmelidir. Belirtilen arabirim, birincil arabirim değilse, daha önce IP örneğine* eklenmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1822">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. The specified interface, if not the primary interface, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1823">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1823">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1824">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1824">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1825">**interface_index** Ağ arabirimini belirten Dizin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1825">**interface_index** Index specifying network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1826">**interface_name** Ağ arabiriminin adını tutan arabelleğin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1826">**interface_name** Pointer to the buffer that holds the name of the network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1827">**ip_address** Arabirimin IP adresi için hedefin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1827">**ip_address** Pointer to the destination for the IP address of the interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1828">**network_mask** Ağ maskesi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1828">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1829">**mtu_size** Bu arabirim için en fazla aktarım birimi için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1829">**mtu_size** Pointer to destination for maximum transfer unit for this interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1830">**physical_address_msw** Cihaz MAC adresi için en iyi 16 bit için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Cihaz MAC adresinin daha düşük 32 bitleri için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1832">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1832">Return Values</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) arabirim bilgisi alındı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface information has been obtained.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi girişi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1837">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1838">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1838">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1839">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1839">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1840">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1840">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1841">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1841">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve interface parameters for the specified interface (index
   1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ip_interface_info_get(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                  &name_ptr, &ip_address,
                                  &network_mask,
                                  &mtu_size,
                                  &physical_address_msw,
                                  &physical_address_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface information is
   successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_mtu_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1856">Bir ağ arabiriminin MTU değerini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1856">Set the MTU value of a network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1857">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1857">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG mtu_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1858">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1859">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabirimi için IP MTU değerini yapılandırmak üzere cihaz sürücüsü tarafından kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1859">This service is used by the device driver to configure the IP MTU value for the specified network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1860">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1861">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1861">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1862">**interface_index** Ağ arabiriminin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1862">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU boyutu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1864">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1864">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) MTU değeri başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set MTU value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1871">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1871">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1873">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1873">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       mtu_size = 1500;

/* Set the MTU size of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(&ip_0,
                                 PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mtu_size);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the MTU size was successfully set. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1889">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1889">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1890">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1890">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1891">Bu hizmet, IP örneğinden bir ağ arabiriminin fiziksel adresini alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1891">This service retrieves the physical address of a network interface from the IP instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1895">**physical_msw** Cihaz MAC adresi için en iyi 16 bit için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1895">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1896">**physical_lsw** Cihaz MAC adresinin daha düşük 32 bitleri için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1896">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1897">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi veya fiziksel adres işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1902">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1902">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1903">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1903">Initialization, threads</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG   physical_msw;
ULONG   physical_lsw;
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1921">Belirtilen ağ arabirimi için fiziksel adresi ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1921">Set the physical address for a specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1922">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1922">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT update_driver);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1923">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1924">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabiriminin MAC adresinin fiziksel adresini yapılandırmak için uygulama veya bir cihaz sürücüsü tarafından kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1924">This service is used by the application or a device driver to configure the physical address of the MAC address of the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1925">Yeni MAC adresi, arabirim yapısının denetim bloğuna uygulanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1925">The new MAC address is applied to the control block of the interface structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1926">***Update_driver*** bayrağı ayarlandıysa, cihaz sürücüsü bu MAC adresini Ethernet denetleyicisi olarak programlanabilir olarak güncelleştirebilmesi için bir sürücü düzeyi komut çıkarılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1926">If the ***update_driver*** flag is set, a driver-level command is issued so the device driver is able to update its MAC address programmed into the Ethernet controller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1927">Tipik bir durumda, bu hizmet, MAC adresinin IP yığınına bildirimde bulunan başlatma aşaması sırasında arabirim cihaz sürücüsünden çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1927">In a typical situation, this service is called from the interface device driver during initialization phase to notify the IP stack of its MAC address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1928">Bu durumda ***update_driver*** bayrağı ayarlanmamalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1928">In this case, the ***update_driver*** flag should not be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1929">Bu yordam, çalışma zamanında arabirim MAC adresini yeniden yapılandırmak için Kullanıcı uygulamasından da çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1929">This routine can also be called from user application to reconfigure the interface MAC address at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1930">Bu kullanım durumunda, yeni MAC adresinin cihaz sürücüsüne uygulanabilmesi için ***update_driver*** bayrağının ayarlanması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1930">In this use case, the ***update_driver*** flag should be set, so the new MAC address can be applied to the device driver.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1931">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1932">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1932">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1933">**interface_index** Ağ arabiriminin dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1933">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1934">**physical_msw** Cihaz MAC adresi için en iyi 16 bit için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1934">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1935">**physical_lsw** Cihaz MAC adresinin daha düşük 32 bitleri için hedef işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1935">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1936">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı küme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4b) komutu sürücü tarafından tanınmıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) Command not recognized by the driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1944">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1946">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1946">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       physical_msw = 0x00CF;
ULONG       physical_lsw = 0x01020304;

/* Set the physical address of specified device. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              physical_msw,
                                              physical_lsw,
                                              NX_TRUE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1961">Bir IP örneğinin durumunu denetleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1961">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1962">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1962">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1963">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1964">Bu hizmet, daha önce oluşturulmuş bir IP örneğinin ağ arabiriminin belirtilen durumunu denetler ve isteğe bağlı olarak bekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1964">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1965">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1965">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1966">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1966">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1967">**interface_index** Arabirim dizin numarası needed_status istenen IP durumu, bit eşleme biçiminde şu şekilde tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1967">**interface_index** Interface index number needed_status IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1977">**actual_status** Gerçek bitler kümesinin hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1977">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1978">wait_option, istenen durum bitleri yoksa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1978">wait_option Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1979">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1979">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1981">**zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001 üzerinden 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1981">**timeout value** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1983">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1983">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP durum denetimi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) durum isteği belirtilen zaman aşımı süresi içinde karşılanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP işaretçisi veya geçersiz hale geldi ya da gerçek durum işaretçisi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) geçersiz gerekli durum seçeneği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index Aralık dışında.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index is out of range.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1990">ya da arabirim geçerli değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1990">or the interface is not valid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1991">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1991">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1992">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1992">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1993">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1993">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1994">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1994">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-1995">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-1995">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_interface_status_check(&ip_0, 1, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                                      &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the secondary link for the specified IP
   instance is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2010">Bağlantı durumu değiştirme bildirimi geri arama işlevini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2010">Set the link status change notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2011">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2011">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*link_status_change_notify)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT interface_index, UINT link_up));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2012">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2013">Bu hizmet bağlantı durumu değişikliği bildirim geri arama işlevini yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2013">This service configures the link status change notify callback function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2014">Kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan *link_status_change_notify* yordamı, birincil veya ikincil arabirim durumu DEĞIŞTIRILDIĞINDE (IP adresi değiştirildiğinde) çağrılır. *LINK_STATUS_CHANGE_NOTIFY* null ise, bağlantı durumu değiştirme bildirimi geri arama özelliği devre dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2014">The user-supplied *link_status_change_notify* routine is invoked when either the primary or secondary interface status is changed (such as IP address is changed.) If *link_status_change_notify* is NULL, the link status change notify callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2015">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2015">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2016">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2016">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2017">**link_status_change_notify** Fiziksel arabirimde bir değişiklikten sonra çağrılacak Kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan geri arama işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2017">**link_status_change_notify** User-supplied callback function to be called upon a change to the physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2018">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı küme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi veya yeni fiziksel adres işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or new physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2022">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2022">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2023">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2023">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2024">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2024">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2025">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2026">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2026">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure a callback function to be used when the physical
   interface status is changed. */
status = nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(&ip_0,
                                             my_change_cb);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the link status change notify function
   is set. */
```
