## <a name="nx_ip_max_payload_size_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2041">İşlem en yüksek paket veri yükü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2041">Compute maximum packet data payload</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2042">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2042">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_address,
    UINT if_index,
    UINT src_port,
    UINT dest_port,
    ULONG protocol,
    ULONG *start_offset_ptr,
    ULONG *payload_length_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2043">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2043">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2044">Bu hizmet, hedefe ulaşmak için IP parçalanmasını gerektirmeyen en büyük uygulama yükü boyutunu bulur; Örneğin, yük yerel arabirim MTU boyutunun altında veya altında olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2044">This service finds the maximum application payload size that will not require IP fragmentation to reach the destination; e.g., payload is at or below the local interface MTU size.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2045">(veya IPv6 yolu MTU Keşfi aracılığıyla elde edilen yol MTU değeri).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2045">(or the Path MTU value obtained via IPv6 Path MTU discovery).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2046">IP üstbilgisi ve üst uygulama üst bilgi boyutu (TCP veya UDP) Toplam yükten çıkarılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2046">IP header and upper application header size (TCP or UDP) are subtracted from the total payload.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2047">NetX Duo IPSec Güvenlik Ilkesi bu uç noktaya geçerliyse, IPSec üstbilgileri (ESP/AH) ve Ilk vektör gibi ilişkili ek yük da MTU 'dan çıkarılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2047">If NetX Duo IPsec Security Policy applies to this end-point, the IPsec headers (ESP/AH) and associated overhead, such as Initial Vector, are also subtracted from the MTU.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2048">Bu hizmet hem IPv4 hem de IPv6 paketleri için geçerlidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2048">This service is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2049">*İf_index* parametresi, paketi göndermek için kullanılacak arabirimi belirtir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2049">The parameter *if_index* specifies the interface to use for sending out the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2050">Çok ana bir sistem için, hedef bir yayın (yalnızca IPv4), çok noktaya yayın veya IPv6 bağlantısı-yerel adresi ise çağıranın *if_index* parametresini belirtmesi gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2050">For a multihome system, the caller needs to specify the *if_index* parameter if the destination is a broadcast (IPv4 only), multicast, or IPv6 link-local address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2051">Bu hizmet, çağırana iki değer döndürür:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2051">This service returns two values to the caller:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2052">start_offset_ptr: TCP/UDP/IP/IPSec başlıklarındaki konumdur;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2052">start_offset_ptr: This is the location after the TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec headers;</span></span>
2) <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2053">payload_length_ptr: veri uygulama miktarı, MTU aşmadan aktarılamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2053">payload_length_ptr: the amount of data application may transfer without exceeding MTU.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2054">Eşdeğer bir NetX hizmeti yoktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2054">There is no equivalent NetX service.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2055">Kısıtlamalar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2055">Restrictions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2056">IP örneğinin önceden oluşturulması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2056">The IP instance must be previously created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2057">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2058">**ip_ptr** IP örneği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2058">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2059">**dest_address** Paket hedef adresi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2059">**dest_address** Pointer to packet destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2060">**if_index** Kullanılacak arabirimin dizinini belirtir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2060">**if_index** Indicates the index of the interface to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2061">**src_port** Kaynak bağlantı noktası numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2061">**src_port** Source port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2062">**dest_port** Hedef bağlantı noktası numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2062">**dest_port** Destination port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2063">**protokol** Kullanılacak üst katman Protokolü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2063">**protocol** Upper layer protocol to be used</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Maksimum paket yükü için veri başına işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Pointer to the start of data for maximum packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Üst bilgi hariç yük boyutu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Pointer to payload size excluding headers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2066">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2066">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2067">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) yük başarıyla hesaplandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2067">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Payload successfully computed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçersiz veya arabirim geçerli değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is invalid, or the interface is not valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi veya geçersiz hedef adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer, or invalid destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz adres sağlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid address supplied</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X4b) geçersiz protokol (UDP veya TCP değil)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Invalid protocol (not UDP or TCP)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) hizmeti sistem başlatma veya iş parçacığı bağlamından çağrılmıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2074">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2074">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2075">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2075">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2076">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2076">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2077">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2077">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2078">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2078">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following example determines the maximum payload for UDP
   packet to remote host. */
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
status = nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(&ip_0,
                                     &dest_ipv6_address,
                                     PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     source_port,
                                     dest_port, NX_PROTOCOL_UDP,
                                     &start_offset,
                                     &payload_length);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet payload
   payload_length starting at the offset start_offset is
   successfully computed. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2104">Ham paket göndermeyi/almayı devre dışı bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2104">Disable raw packet sending/receiving</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2105">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2106">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2107">Bu hizmet, bu IP örneği için ham IP paketlerinin aktarımını ve alımını devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2107">This service disables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2108">Ham paket hizmeti önceden etkinleştirildiyse ve alma kuyruğunda ham paketler varsa, bu hizmet alınan tüm ham paketleri serbest bırakabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2108">If the raw packet service was previously enabled, and there are raw packets in the receive queue, this service will release any received raw packets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2109">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2110">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2110">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2111">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2111">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP ham paket devre dışı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2115">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2116">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2116">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2117">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2117">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2118">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2118">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2119">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2119">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(&ip_0);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been disabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2130">Ham paket işlemeyi etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2130">Enable raw packet processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2131">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2131">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2132">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2133">Bu hizmet, bu IP örneği için ham IP paketleri aktarımına ve alımına izin vermez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2133">This service enables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2134">Gelen TCP, UDP, ıCMP ve ıGMP paketleri NetX Duo tarafından hala işlenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2134">Incoming TCP, UDP, ICMP, and IGMP packets are still processed by NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2135">Bilinmeyen üst katman protokol türlerine sahip paketler, ham paket alma yordamına göre işlenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2135">Packets with unknown upper layer protocol types are processed by raw packet reception routine.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2136">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2137">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2137">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2138">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2138">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP ham paket etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2142">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2143">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2143">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2144">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2144">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2145">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2145">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2146">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2146">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been enabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2157">Ham IP paket filtresini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2157">Set raw IP packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2158">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2158">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT (*raw_packet_filter)(NX_IP *, ULONG, NX_PACKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2159">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2159">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2160">Bu hizmet, IP ham paket filtresini yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2160">This service configures the IP raw packet filter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2161">Kullanıcı uygulaması tarafından uygulanan ham paket filtresi işlevi, bir uygulamanın kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan ölçütlere göre ham paketler almasına izin verir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2161">The raw packet filter function, implemented by user application, allows an application to receive raw packets based on user-supplied criteria.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2162">NetX Duo BSD sarmalayıcı katmanının, BSD katmanındaki ham yuvayı işlemek için ham paket filtresi özelliğini kullandığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2162">Note that NetX Duo BSD wrapper layer uses the raw packet filter feature to handle raw socket in the BSD layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2163">Bu hizmeti kullanmak için NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** seçeneği ile oluşturulmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2163">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2164">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2164">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2165">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2165">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Ham paket filtresinin işlev işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Function pointer of the raw packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2167">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2167">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ham paket filtresi yordamını başarıyla ayarladı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the raw packet filter routine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4b) ham paket desteği kullanılamıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) Raw packet support is not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2172">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2173">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2173">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2174">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2174">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2175">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2175">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2176">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2176">Example</span></span>

```c
UINT raw_packet_filter(NX_IP *ip_ptr, ULONG protocol,
                       NX_PACKET *packet_ptr)
{

/* Simply filter protocol. */
if(protocol == NX_IP_RAW)
   return NX_SUCCESS;
else
   return NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL;
}

void raw_packet_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

/* Set the raw packet filter of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(&ip_0,
                                     raw_packet_filter);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the raw packet filter of IP instance
   was successfully set. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2181">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2181">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2185">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2185">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2187">Ham IP paketi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2187">Receive raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2188">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2188">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2189">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2189">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2190">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneğinden bir ham IP paketi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2190">This service receives a raw IP packet from the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2191">Ham paket alma kuyruğunda IP paketleri varsa, arayana ilk (en eski) paket döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2191">If there are IP packets on the raw packet receive queue, the first (oldest) packet is returned to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2192">Aksi takdirde, kullanılabilir bir paket yoksa, çağıran bekleme seçeneğinde belirtilen şekilde askıya alabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2192">Otherwise, if no packets are available, the caller may suspend as specified by the wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]   
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2193">*NX_SUCCESS, döndürülürse, uygulama artık gerekli olmadığında alınan paketi serbest bırakmaktan sorumludur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2193">*If NX_SUCCESS, is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2194">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2195">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2195">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2196">**packet_ptr** Alınan ham IP paketinin yerleştirileceği işaretçiye işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2196">**packet_ptr** Pointer to pointer to place the received raw IP packet in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2197">**wait_option** Paketler kullanılamıyorsa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2197">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if packets are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2198">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2198">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2201">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2201">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2202">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2202">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP ham paket alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) kullanılabilir paket yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet was available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya dönüş paketi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2209">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2210">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2210">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2211">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2211">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2212">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2212">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2213">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2213">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a raw IP packet for this IP instance, wait for a maximum
   of 4 timer ticks. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(&ip_0, &packet_ptr, 4);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointer is in the
   variable packet_ptr. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2224">Ham IP paketi gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2224">Send raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2225">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2225">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2226">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2227">Bu hizmet, hedef IP adresine bir ham IPv4 paketi gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2227">This service sends a raw IPv4 packet to the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2228">Bu yordamın hemen geri döndüğüne ve bu nedenle IP paketinin gerçekten gönderilip gönderilmediğini bilinmediğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2228">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is therefore not known whether the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2229">Ağ sürücüsü, iletim tamamlandığında paketin serbest bırakılmasından sorumlu olacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2229">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2230">NetX Duo, çok kullanıcılı bir sistem için hedef IP adresini kullanarak uygun bir ağ arabirimi bulur ve arabirimin IP adresini kaynak adres olarak kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2230">For a multihome system, NetX Duo uses the destination IP address to find an appropriate network interface and uses the IP address of the interface as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2231">Hedef IP adresi yayın veya çok noktaya yayın ise, ilk geçerli arabirim kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2231">If the destination IP address is broadcast or multicast, the first valid interface is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2232">Uygulamalar bu durumda ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2232">Applications use the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** in this case.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2233">Ham IPv6 paketini göndermek için uygulama, ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ veya _ nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send hizmetini kullanır *_._**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2233">To send a raw IPv6 packet, application shall use the service ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ or _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2234">*Bir hata döndürülmediği takdirde, uygulama bu çağrıdan sonra paketi serbest bırakmamalıdır. Bunu yapmak öngörülemeyen sonuçlara neden olur çünkü ağ sürücüsü iletim sonrasında paketi serbest bırakacaktır*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2234">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2235">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2235">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2236">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2236">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2237">**packet_ptr** Gönderilen ham IP paketinin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2237">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the raw IP packet to send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2238">**destination_ip** Hedef IP adresi, belirli bir ana bilgisayar IP adresi, bir ağ yayını, iç geri döngü veya çok noktaya yayın adresi olabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2238">**destination_ip** Destination IP address, which can be a specific host IP address, a network broadcast, an internal loop-back, or a multicast address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2239">**Type_of_service** İletim için hizmet türünü tanımlar, yasal değerler aşağıdaki gibidir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2239">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2245">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2245">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP ham paket gönderimi başlatıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet send initiated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ham IP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) geçersiz hizmet türü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) pakette bir IP üst bilgisini eklemek için yeterli yer yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room to prepend an IP header on the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) paket ekleme işaretçisi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2254">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2254">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2255">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2255">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2256">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2256">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2257">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2257">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2258">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2258">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a raw IP packet to IP address 1.2.3.5. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                               IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                               NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointed to by
   packet_ptr has been sent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2268">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2268">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2270">Belirtilen ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla ham IP paketi gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2270">Send raw IP packet through specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2271">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2271">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2272">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2272">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2273">Bu hizmet, kaynak adres olarak belirtilen yerel IPv4 adresini ve ilişkili ağ arabirimini kullanarak hedef IP adresine bir ham IP paketi gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2273">This service sends a raw IP packet to the destination IP address using the specified local IPv4 address as the source address, and through the associated network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2274">Bu yordamın hemen geri döndüğüne ve bu nedenle, IP paketinin gerçekten gönderildiyse bilinmediğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2274">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is, therefore, not known if the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2275">Ağ sürücüsü, iletim tamamlandığında paketin serbest bırakılmasından sorumlu olacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2275">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2276">Bu hizmet, paketin gerçekten gönderilip gönderilmediğini bilmenin bir yolu olmadığından diğer hizmetlerden farklıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2276">This service differs from other services in that there is no way of knowing if the packet was actually sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2277">Internet 'te kaybolabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2277">It could get lost on the Internet.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2278">*Ham IP işlemenin etkin olması gerektiğini unutmayın*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2278">*Note that raw IP processing must be enabled*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2279">Bu *hizmet **nx_ip_raw_packet_send benzerdir,** ancak bu hizmet, bir uygulamanın belirtilen fiziksel arabirimlerden ham IPv4 paketi göndermesini sağlar*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2279">*This service is similar to **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** except that this service allows an application to send raw IPv4 packet from a specified physical interfaces*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2280">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2280">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2281">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP görevi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2281">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP task.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2282">**packet_ptr** İletilecek paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2282">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2283">**destination_ip** Paketin gönderileceği IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2283">**destination_ip** IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2284">**address_index** Paketin dışına gönderilmesi için arabirim adresinin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2284">**address_index** Index of the address of the interface to send packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2285">**Type_of_service** Paket için hizmet türü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2285">**type_of_service** Type of service for packet.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2286">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2286">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paketi başarıyla iletildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully transmitted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) uygun bir giden arabirim yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) No suitable outgoing interface available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ham IP paket işleme etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP packet processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi girişi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) geçersiz hizmet türü belirtildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) geçersiz paket önüne işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) geçersiz paket önüne işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz arabirim dizini belirtildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index specified.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2296">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2297">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2297">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2298">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2298">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2299">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2299">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2300">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2300">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_IDNEX 1

/* Send packet out on interface 1 with normal type of service. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(ip_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                      destination_ip,
                                      ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                      NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the packet was successfully
   transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2311">En fazla ham alma kuyruğu boyutunu ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2311">Set maximum raw receive queue size</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2312">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2312">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG queue_max);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2313">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2314">Bu hizmet, IP ham paket alma sırasının en büyük derinliğini yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2314">This service configures the maximum depth of the IP raw packet receive queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2315">IP ham paket alma sırasının hem IPv4 hem de IPv6 paketleriyle paylaşıldığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2315">Note that the IP raw packet receive queue is shared with both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2316">Ham paket alma kuyruğu userconfigured maksimum derinliğe ulaştığında, yeni alınan ham paketler bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2316">When the raw packet receive queue reaches the userconfigured maximum depth, newly received raw packets are dropped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2317">Varsayılan IP ham paket alma sırası derinliği 20 ' dir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2317">The default IP raw packet receive queue depth is 20.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2318">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2319">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2319">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2320">**queue_max** Sıra boyutu için yeni değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2320">**queue_max** New value for the queue size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2321">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ham alma kuyruğu en yüksek derinliğine başarıyla ayarlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set raw receive queue maximum depth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2325">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2326">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2327">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2327">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2328">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2328">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2329">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2329">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG queue_max = 10;

/* Set the maximum size of the IP raw packet receive queue. */
status = nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set (&ip_0,
                                          queue_max);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the maximum size of the IP raw packet
   receive queue was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2340">Yönlendirme tablosuna statik yol ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2340">Add static route to the routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2341">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask,
    ULONG next_hop);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2342">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2343">Bu hizmet, statik yönlendirme tablosuna bir giriş ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2343">This service adds an entry to the static routing table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2344">*Next_hop* adresine yerel ağ aygıtlarından birinden doğrudan erişilebilir olması gerektiğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2344">Note that the *next_hop* address must be directly accessible from one of the local network devices.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2345">*İp_ptr geçerli bir NetX Duo IP yapısına işaret etmelidir ve NETX Duo kitaplığı bu hizmeti kullanmak için tanımlanan NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING birlikte oluşturulmalıdır. Varsayılan olarak NetX Duo NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING tanımlanmış olmadan oluşturulur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2345">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2346">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2346">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2347">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2347">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2348">**network_address** Konak bayt düzeninde hedef ağ adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2348">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2349">**net_mask** Konak bayt düzeninde hedef ağ maskesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2349">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2350">**next_hop** Hedef ağ için, ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde sonraki atlama adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2350">**next_hop** Next hop address for the target network, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2351">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2351">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) girişi statik yönlendirme tablosuna eklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) statik yönlendirme tablosu dolu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Static routing table is full.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) Bu özellik ' de derlenmiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) sonraki atlama, yerel arabirimler aracılığıyla doğrudan erişilemez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Next hop is not directly accessible via local interfaces.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz ip_ptr işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2358">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2359">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2359">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2360">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2360">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2361">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2361">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2362">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2362">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Specify the next hop for 192.168.1.68 through the gateway
   192.168.1.1. */
status = nx_ip_static_route_add(ip_ptr, IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,1));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully added to the
   static routing table. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2373">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2373">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2375">Yönlendirme tablosundan statik yolu Sil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2375">Delete static route from routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2376">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2377">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2378">Bu hizmet, statik yönlendirme tablosundan bir girişi siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2378">This service deletes an entry from the static routing table.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2379">*İp_ptr geçerli bir NetX Duo IP yapısına işaret etmelidir ve NETX Duo kitaplığı bu hizmeti kullanmak için tanımlanan NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING birlikte oluşturulmalıdır. Varsayılan olarak NetX Duo NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING tanımlanmış olmadan oluşturulur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2379">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2380">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2381">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2381">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2382">**network_address** Konak bayt düzeninde hedef ağ adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2382">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2383">**net_mask** Konak bayt düzeninde hedef ağ maskesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2383">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2384">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2384">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) statik yönlendirme tablosundan başarıyla silindi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful deletion from the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) girişi, yönlendirme tablosunda bulunamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Entry cannot be found in the routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) Bu özellik ' de derlenmiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz ip_ptr işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2390">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2391">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2391">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2392">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2392">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2393">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2393">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2394">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2394">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Remove the static route for 192.168.1.68 from the routing
   table.*/
status = nx_ip_static_route_delete(ip_ptr,
                                   IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                   0xFFFFFF00UL,);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully removed from
   the static routing table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2407">Bir IP örneğinin durumunu denetleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2407">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2408">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2408">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2409">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2410">Bu hizmet, daha önce oluşturulmuş bir IP örneğinin birincil ağ arabiriminin belirtilen durumunu denetler ve isteğe bağlı olarak bekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2410">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the primary network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2411">İkincil arabirimlerde durum almak için, uygulamalar hizmeti ***nx_ip_interface_status_check kullanacaktır.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2411">To obtain status on secondary interfaces, applications shall use the service ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2412">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2413">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2413">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2414">**needed_status** Aşağıdaki gibi bit eşleme biçiminde tanımlanan IP durumu istendi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2414">**needed_status** IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2424">**actual_status** Gerçek bitler kümesinin hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2424">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2425">**wait_option** İstenen durum bitleri yoksa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2425">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2426">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2426">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2428">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2428">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2430">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2430">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı IP durum denetimi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) durum isteği belirtilen zaman aşımı süresi içinde karşılanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP işaretçisi veya geçersiz hale geldi ya da gerçek durum işaretçisi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) geçersiz gerekli durum seçeneği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2436">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2436">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2437">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2437">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2438">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2438">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2439">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2439">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2440">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2440">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_status_check(&ip_0, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                            &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link for the specified IP instance
   is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2466">IP örneğini bir arabirim aracılığıyla belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubuna ekleyin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2466">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2467">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2467">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2468">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2469">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla bir IP örneğini belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubuna birleştirir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2469">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2470">IP örneği bir çok noktaya yayın grubuna katıldığında, IP alma mantığı, çok noktaya yayın grubundaki veri paketlerini üst katmana iletmeyi başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2470">Once the IP instance joins a multicast group, the IP receive logic starts to forward data packets from the give multicast group to the upper layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2471">Bu hizmetin, ıGMP raporları göndermeden çok noktaya yayın grubunu birleştirdiğine unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2471">Note that this service joins a multicast group without sending IGMP reports.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2472">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2472">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2473">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2473">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2474">**group_address** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde katılacak sınıf D IP çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2474">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2475">**interface_index** NetX Duo örneğine iliştirilmiş arabirimin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2475">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2476">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2476">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok noktaya yayın grubu katılımı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) daha fazla çok noktaya yayın grubu birleştirilemez, en fazla sınır aşıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP örneğine geçersiz IŞARETÇI veya IP örneği geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) ıGMP bu IP örneğinde etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled in this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi geçerli bir sınıf D adresi değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) cihaz dizini geçersiz bir ağ arabirimine işaret ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2484">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2485">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2485">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2486">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2486">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2487">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2487">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2488">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2488">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```
