## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2501">Belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubunu bir arabirim aracılığıyla bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2501">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2502">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2502">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2503">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2504">Bu hizmet belirtilen ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubunu bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2504">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2505">Gruptan ayrıldıktan sonra bu hizmet, oluşturulan ıGMP iletilerini tetiklemez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2505">After leaving the group, this service does not trigger IGMP messages being generated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2506">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2506">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2507">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2507">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2508">**group_address** Bırakılacak sınıf D IP çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2508">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2509">IP adresi ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2509">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2510">**interface_index** NetX Duo örneğine iliştirilmiş arabirimin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2510">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2511">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2511">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok noktaya yayın grubu katılımı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi yerel çok noktaya yayın tablosunda bulunamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) cihaz dizini geçersiz bir ağ arabirimine işaret ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) belirtilen çok noktaya yayın grubu adresi geçerli bir sınıf D adresi değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP örneğine geçersiz IŞARETÇI veya IP örneği geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2518">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2518">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2519">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2519">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2520">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2520">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2521">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2522">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2522">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2534">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2534">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2536">Belirtilen havuzdan paket ayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2538">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2539">Bu hizmet belirtilen havuzdan bir paket ayırır ve belirtilen paket türüne göre paketteki preppointer 'ı ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2540">Kullanılabilir bir paket yoksa hizmet, sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2541">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2542">**pool_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan paket havuzuna yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2543">**packet_ptr** Ayrılan paket Işaretçisinin Işaretçisine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2544">**packet_type** İstenen paket türünü tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2545">Desteklenen paket türlerinin listesi için, Bölüm 3 ' teki "Paket havuzları 63" bölümüne bakın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2546">**wait_option** Paket havuzunda kullanılabilir bir paket yoksa, zaman işaretleri cinsinden bekleme süresini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2547">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2550">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2551">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket ayırması.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) kullanılabilir paket yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) paket boyutu Protokolü desteklenemez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) geçersiz paket türü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz havuz veya paket döndürme işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Iş parçacığından geçersiz bekleme seçeneği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2559">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2560">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs (uygulama ağ sürücüleri).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2561">Wait seçeneği, ıSR 'de veya zamanlayıcı bağlamında kullanıldığında *NX_NO_WAIT* olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2562">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2563">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2564">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2579">Paketi Kopyala</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2580">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2581">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2582">Bu hizmet, sağlanan paketteki bilgileri sağlanan paket havuzundan ayrılan bir veya daha fazla yeni pakete kopyalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2583">Başarılı olursa, yeni pakete yönelik işaretçi **new_packet_ptr** tarafından işaret edilen hedefte döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2584">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2585">**packet_ptr** Kaynak paketine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Paketin yeni kopyasına işaretçinin nereye dönebileceği hedefe yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2587">**pool_ptr** Kopya için bir veya daha fazla paket ayırmak için kullanılan önceden oluşturulmuş paket havuzuna yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2588">**wait_option** Kullanılabilir bir paket yoksa hizmetin nasıl bekleyeceğini tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2589">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2592">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2593">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket kopyası.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) paketi kopyalama için kullanılamaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) boş kaynak paketi veya kopyalama başarısız oldu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) paket boyutu Protokolü desteklenemez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz havuz, paket veya hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) geçersiz paket önüne işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) geçersiz paket ekleme işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) başlatma veya ISR içinde bir bekleme seçeneği belirtildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2603">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2604">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2605">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2606">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2606">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2607">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2622">Paketi sonuna veri Ekle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2623">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2624">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2625">Bu hizmet, verileri belirtilen paketin sonuna ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2626">Sağlanan veri alanı pakete kopyalanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2627">Yeterli kullanılabilir bellek yoksa ve zincirleme paket özelliği etkinse, isteği karşılamak için bir veya daha fazla paket ayrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2628">Zincirleme paket özelliği etkinleştirilmemişse, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2629">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2630">**packet_ptr** Paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2631">**data_start** Pakete eklenecek kullanıcının veri alanının başlangıcına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2632">**data_size** Kullanıcının veri alanının boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2633">**pool_ptr** Geçerli pakette yeterli alan yoksa başka bir paketin ayırabileceği paket havuzu işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2634">**wait_option** Kullanılabilir bir paket yoksa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2635">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2638">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2639">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket ekleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) kullanılabilir paket yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) paket boyutu Protokolü desteklenemez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend işaretçisi yük başlangıcından daha küçüktür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) ekleme işaretçisi yük ucundan daha büyük.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz havuz, paket veya veri işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) geçersiz veri boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Iş parçacığından geçersiz bekleme seçeneği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2649">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2650">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs (uygulama ağ sürücüleri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2651">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2652">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2653">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2668">Bir sapmayı kullanarak paketten veri ayıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2669">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2670">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2671">Bu hizmet bir NETX Duo paketinden (veya paket zincirinden), belirtilen boyutun belirtilen baytdaki paket önüne işaretçisinin belirtilen uzaklığında başlayarak verileri kopyalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2672">Gerçekten kopyalanmış olan bayt sayısı *bytes_copied döndürülür.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2673">Bu hizmet, paketten verileri kaldırmaz veya önüne işaretçisini veya diğer iç durum bilgilerini ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2674">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2675">**packet_ptr** Ayıklanacak paket işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2676">**konum** Geçerli önüne işaretçisinden gelen fark.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2677">**buffer_start** Kaydetme arabelleğinin başlangıcı işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2678">**BUFFER_LENGTH** Kopyalanacak bayt sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2679">**bytes_copied** Gerçekten kopyalandığı bayt sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2680">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket kopyası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) geçersiz fark değeri sağlandı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz paket işaretçisi veya arabellek işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2684">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2685">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2686">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2687">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2702">Paketten veri al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2703">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2704">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2705">Bu hizmet, sağlanan paketten verileri sağlanan arabelleğe kopyalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2706">Hedef, **bytes_copied** tarafından işaret edilen hedefte döndürülen gerçek bayt sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2707">Bu hizmetin paketin iç durumunu değiştirmediğini unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2708">Alınmakta olan veriler pakette hala kullanılabilir durumda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2709">*Hedef arabelleğinin paketin içeriğini tutabilecek kadar büyük olması gerekir. Aksi takdirde, bellek bozulması öngörülemeyen sonuçlara neden* olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2710">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2711">**packet_ptr** Kaynak paketine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2712">**buffer_start** Arabellek alanının başlangıcına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2713">**bytes_copied** Kopyalanmış bayt sayısı için hedefin işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2714">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket verileri alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) geçersiz paket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz paket, arabellek başlangıcı veya bayt kopyalanmış işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2718">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2719">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2720">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2721">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2722">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2737">Paket verilerinin uzunluğunu al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2738">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c

    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2739">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2740">Bu hizmet, belirtilen paketteki verilerin uzunluğunu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2741">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2741">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2744">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket uzunluğu Get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2748">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2749">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2751">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2751">Example</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2766">Belirtilen bellek alanında paket havuzu oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2767">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2768">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2769">Bu hizmet, Kullanıcı tarafından sağlanan bellek alanında belirtilen paket boyutunun bir paket havuzunu oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2770">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2771">**pool_ptr** Paket havuzu denetim bloğu işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2772">**ad** Paket havuzu için uygulama adı işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2773">**payload_size** Havuzdaki her paketteki bayt sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2774">Bu değer en az 40 bayt olmalıdır ve ayrıca 4 ile eşit olarak bölünebilmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2775">**memory_ptr** Paket havuzunun yerleştirileceği bellek alanına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2776">İşaretçi bir ULONG sınırında hizalanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2777">**memory_size** Havuz belleği alanının boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2778">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket havuzu oluşturma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz havuz veya bellek işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) geçersiz blok veya bellek boyutu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

```c

   address 0x10000000. */

   created. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>

```c

```

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2809">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2832">Bir paket havuzu hakkında bilgi alma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2833">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2834">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2835">Bu hizmet, belirtilen paket havuzu hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2836">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2837">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2838">**pool_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan paket havuzuna yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2839">**total_packets** Havuzdaki toplam paket sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2840">**free_packets** Şu anda boş olan paketlerin toplam sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Havuz boş olduğunda toplam ayırma isteği sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Boş havuz getirilmesi toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Toplam geçersiz paket sürümü sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2844">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket havuzu bilgileri alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2848">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2849">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları ve zamanlayıcılar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2850">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2851">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2852">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2869">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2870">Bu hizmet, belirtilen paket havuzu için düşük filigranı yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2871">Düşük filigran değeri ayarlandıktan sonra, paket havuzundaki kullanılabilir paketlerin sayısı paket havuzunun düşük filigranından azsa, paket havuzunun paketlerin tükenmesini engellemek için, TCP veya UDP alınan paketleri sıraya almamayacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2872">NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** seçeneği ile derlenip bu hizmet kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2873">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2874">**pool_ptr** Paket havuzu denetim bloğu işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2875">**low_watermark** Yapılandırılacak düşük eşik değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2876">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) düşük eşik değerini başarıyla ayarladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) düşük filigran özelliği NETX Duo içinde yerleşik değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz havuz işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2881">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2882">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2883">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2884">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2885">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2900">Önceden ayrılmış paketi serbest bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2902">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2903">Bu hizmet, belirtilen pakete zincirleme ek paketler de dahil olmak üzere bir paket yayınlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2904">Paket ayırma üzerinde başka bir iş parçacığı engellenirse, paket verilir ve sürdürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2905">*Uygulamanın, bir paketin birden çok kez serbest bırakılmasını önlemesi gerekir, çünkü bunu yapmak öngörülemeyen sonuçlara neden olur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2906">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2907">**packet_ptr** Paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2908">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı paket sürümü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend işaretçisi yük başlangıcından daha küçüktür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) ekleme işaretçisi yük ucundan daha büyük.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2913">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2914">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs (uygulama ağ sürücüleri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2915">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2916">Yes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2917">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2928">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2928">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2932">İletilen bir paketi serbest bırakma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2933">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2934">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2935">Bu hizmet, TCP olmayan paketler için, belirtilen pakete zincirleme ek paketler de dahil olmak üzere, iletilen bir paket yayınlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2936">Paket ayırma üzerinde başka bir iş parçacığı engellenirse, paket verilir ve sürdürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2937">İletilen bir TCP paketi için paket aktarılmakta olarak işaretlenir ancak paket onaylanana kadar serbest bırakılmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2938">Bu hizmet genellikle bir paket iletildikten sonra uygulamanın ağ sürücüsünden çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2939">*Ağ sürücüsünün fiziksel medya üstbilgisini kaldırması ve bu hizmeti çağırmadan önce paketin uzunluğunu ayarlaması gerekir*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2940">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2941">**packet_ptr** Paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2942">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı iletme paketi sürümü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend işaretçisi yük başlangıcından daha küçüktür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) ekleme işaretçisi yük ucundan daha büyük.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2947">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2948">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar, uygulama ağ sürücüleri (ISRS dahil)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2949">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2950">Yes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2951">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2966">Ters adres çözümleme protokolünü devre dışı bırak (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2967">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2967">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2988">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2989">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2990">Bu hizmet, belirli IP örneği için NetX Duo 'un RARP bileşenini sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2991">RARP bileşenleri, sıfır IP adresi için tüm bağlı ağ arabirimlerini arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2992">Sıfır IP adresi, arabirimin henüz IP adresi ataması olmadığını gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2993">RARP, bu arabirimde RARP işlemini etkinleştirerek IP adresini çözümlemeye çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2994">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2995">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2996">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı RARP etkinleştirmesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP adresi zaten geçerli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP zaten etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3003">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3003">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

```c
/* Enable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3011">RARP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3012">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3013">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3014">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için RARP etkinlikleriyle ilgili bilgileri alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3015">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3016">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3017">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Gönderilen toplam RARP isteği sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Alınan toplam RARP yanıtı sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Toplam geçersiz ileti sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3021">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bir RARP bilgileri alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3026">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3027">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3028">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3029">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3029">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3030">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3030">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve RARP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_rarp_info_get(&ip_0,
                          &rarp_requests_sent,
                          &rarp_responses_received,
                          &rarp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3075">İstemci TCP yuvasını TCP bağlantı noktasına bağlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3076">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3077">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3078">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulan TCP istemci yuvasını belirtilen TCP bağlantı noktasına bağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3079">Geçerli TCP Yuvaları 0 ile 0xFFFF arasındadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3080">Belirtilen TCP bağlantı noktası kullanılamıyorsa, hizmet sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3081">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3082">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3083">bağlanacak **bağlantı noktası bağlantı** noktası numarası (1 ile 0xFFFF arasında).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3084">Bağlantı noktası numarası NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000) ise, IP örneği bir sonraki boş bağlantı noktasını arar ve bu bağlantıyı bağlama için kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3085">**wait_option** Bağlantı noktası zaten başka bir yuvaya bağlanmışsa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3086">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3089">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3090">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlaması.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) bu yuva zaten başka bir TCP bağlantı noktasına bağlıydı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) bağlantı noktası zaten farklı bir yuvaya bağlıydı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) boş bağlantı noktası yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) geçersiz bağlantı noktası.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3100">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3101">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3102">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3103">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3104">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```
