## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3129">İstemci TCP yuvasını bağlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3130">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3131">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3132">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulmuş ve bağlı TCP istemci yuvasını belirtilen sunucunun bağlantı noktasına bağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3133">Geçerli TCP sunucusu bağlantı noktaları 0 ile 0xFFFF arasındadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3134">Bağlantı hemen tamamlanmazsa, hizmet sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3135">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3136">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3137">**server_ip** Sunucunun IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3138">**SERVER_PORT** \* \* (1 ile 0xFFFF arasında) Bağlanılacak sunucu bağlantı noktası numarası.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3139">**wait_option** Bağlantı kurulurken hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3140">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3143">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3144">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlantısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) yuva kapalı durumda değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) bekleme belirtilmedi, bağlantı girişimi devam ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz arabirim sağlandı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) GEÇERSIZ sunucu IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) geçersiz bağlantı noktası.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3156">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3157">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3157">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3158">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3158">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3159">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3159">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3160">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3185">İstemci TCP yuvasına bağlantı noktası numarasını al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3186">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3187">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3188">Bu hizmet, yuvanın bağlandığı zamanda NX_ANY_PORT belirtildiği durumlarda NetX Duo tarafından ayrılan bağlantı noktasını bulmak için yararlı olan yuva ile ilişkili bağlantı noktası numarasını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3189">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3190">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3191">**port_ptr** Dönüş bağlantı noktası numarası için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3192">Geçerli bağlantı noktası numaraları (1 ile 0xFFFF arasında).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3193">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlaması.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) bu yuva bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmamış.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi veya bağlantı noktası döndürme işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3199">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3200">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3200">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3201">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3201">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3202">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3202">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3203">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3203">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of previously created and bound client
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(&client_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3228">TCP bağlantı noktasından TCP istemci yuvasının bağlantısını kaldır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3228">Unbind TCP client socket from TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3229">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3230">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3231">Bu hizmet TCP istemci yuvası ile bir TCP bağlantı noktası arasındaki bağlamayı yayınlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3232">Başka bir yuvayı aynı bağlantı noktası numarasına bağlamayı bekleyen başka iş parçacıkları varsa, ilk askıya alınan iş parçacığı bu bağlantı noktasına bağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3233">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3234">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3235">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlantısı kesiliyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva herhangi bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) yuvasının bağlantısı kesilmedi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket has not been disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3242">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3243">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3244">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3245">Yes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3246">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind a previously created and bound client TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is no longer
   bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3271">NetX Duo 'un TCP bileşenini etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3272">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3273">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3274">Bu hizmet, NetX Duo 'un Iletim Denetim Protokolü (TCP) bileşenini sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3275">Etkinleştirildikten sonra, uygulama tarafından TCP bağlantıları kurulabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3276">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3277">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3278">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı TCP etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP zaten etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3283">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3284">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3285">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3286">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3287">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3312">Sonraki kullanılabilir TCP bağlantı noktasını bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3313">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3314">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3315">Bu hizmet, uygulama tarafından sağlanan bağlantı noktasından başlayarak ücretsiz bir TCP bağlantı noktasını (ilişkisiz) bulmaya çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3316">Arama mantığı, en fazla 0xFFFF bağlantı noktası değerine ulaşmak için arama gerçekleşeceği gibi kaydırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3317">Arama başarılı olursa, *free_port_ptr* tarafından işaret edilen değişkende boş bağlantı noktası döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3318">*Bu hizmet başka bir iş parçacığından çağrılabilir ve aynı bağlantı noktasına sahip olabilir. Bu yarış durumunu engellemek için, uygulama bu hizmeti ve gerçek istemci yuvasını bir mutex 'in koruması altına yerleştirmek isteyebilir*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3319">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3320">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3321">**bağlantı noktası** Aramaya başlamak için bağlantı noktası numarası (1 ile 0xFFFF arasında).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3322">**free_port_ptr** Hedef boş bağlantı noktası dönüş değeri işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3323">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3323">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı boş bağlantı noktası bul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) boş bağlantı noktası bulunamadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) belirtilen bağlantı noktası numarası geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) The specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3330">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3331">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3331">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3332">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3332">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3333">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3333">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3334">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3334">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free TCP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_tcp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, "free_port" contains the next free port
   on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3359">TCP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3360">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3361">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3362">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için TCP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3411">TCP bağlantısını kabul et</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3412">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3413">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3414">Bu hizmet, daha önce dinlemek üzere ayarlanmış bir bağlantı noktası için TCP istemci yuvası bağlantı isteğini kabul eder (veya kabul edilmeye hazırlanır).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3415">Bu hizmet, uygulama dinlemesi veya yeniden dinleme hizmetini çağırırsa ya da istemci bağlantısı gerçekten mevcut olduğunda dinleme geri çağırma yordamından çağrıldıktan sonra çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3416">Bağlantı hemen kurulamazsa, hizmet sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3417">Sunucu *yuvasının sunucu bağlantı noktasına bağlamasını kaldırmak için bağlantı artık gerekmiyorsa, uygulamanın **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** çağrısı gerekir*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3418">*Uygulama geri çağırma yordamları, IP 'nin yardımcı iş parçacığı içinden çağrılır*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3419">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3420">**socket_ptr** TCP sunucusu yuva denetim bloğu işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3421">**wait_option** Bağlantı kurulurken hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3421">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3422">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3422">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3425">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3425">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3426">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3426">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı TCP sunucusu yuvası kabulü (pasif bağlantı).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP server socket accept (passive connect).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) sağlanan sunucu yuvası bir dinleme durumunda değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) The server socket supplied is not in a listen state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) bekleme belirtilmedi, bağlantı girişimi devam ediyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) yuva işaretçisi hatası.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Socket pointer error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3438">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_listen"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3463">TCP bağlantı noktasında istemci bağlantısı dinlemeyi etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3463">Enable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3464">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3464">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT listen_queue_size,
    VOID (*listen_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3465">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3466">Bu hizmet, belirtilen TCP bağlantı noktasında istemci bağlantı isteği dinlemeyi mümkün.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3467">İstemci bağlantı isteği alındığında, sağlanan sunucu yuvası belirtilen bağlantı noktasına bağlanır ve sağlanan dinleme geri çağırma işlevi çağırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3468">Dinleme geri çağırma yordamının işlenmesi tamamen uygulamaya göre yapılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3469">Daha sonra kabul etme işlemini gerçekleştiren bir uygulama iş parçacığını uyandırma mantığını içerebilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3470">Uygulamanın bu yuva için kabul etme sırasında askıya alınmış bir iş parçacığı zaten varsa, dinleme geri çağırma yordamına gerek duyulmayabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3471">Uygulama aynı bağlantı noktasında ek istemci bağlantılarını ele istiyorsa, bir sonraki bağlantı için ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** kullanılabilir bir yuva (kapalı durumda olan bir yuva) ile çağrılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3472">Yeniden dinleme hizmeti çağrılana kadar, ek istemci bağlantıları sıraya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3473">Maksimum sıra derinliği aşıldığında, en eski bağlantı isteği yeni bağlantı isteğini sıraya alma lehine bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3474">En yüksek sıra derinliği bu hizmet tarafından belirtilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3475">*Uygulama geri çağırma yordamları Iç IP Yardımcısı iş parçacığından çağırılır*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3476">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3477">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3477">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3478">**bağlantı noktası** Dinlenecek bağlantı noktası numarası (1 ile 0xFFFF arasında).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3479">**socket_ptr** Bağlantı için kullanılacak yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3480">**listen_queue_size** Sıraya alınabilen istemci bağlantı isteği sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3481">**listen_callback** Bağlantı alındığında çağrılacak uygulama işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3482">NULL belirtilirse, geri arama dinlemesi özelliği devre dışıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3483">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3483">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı TCP bağlantı noktası dinleme etkinleştirmesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port listen enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) daha fazla dinleme isteği yapısı yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) No more listen request structures are available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3486">**_Nx_api. h_** içindeki sabit NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS, kaç tane etkin dinleme isteğinin mümkün olduğunu tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3486">The constant NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS in **_nx_api.h_** defines how many active listen requests are possible.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) sağlanan sunucu yuvası kapalı durumda değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) sağlanan sunucu yuvası bir bağlantı noktasına zaten bağlıydı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) Bu bağlantı noktası için zaten etkin bir dinleme isteği var.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) There is already an active listen request for this port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) geçersiz bağlantı noktası belirtildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3498">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3498">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket.
   This example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
   /* Assuming that:
      "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
      initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created
      and the link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already
      been created.
   */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                        Socket",
                        NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                        NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                        NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
      each client and then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
           request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection
           to complete. */
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
           if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

              /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                 message. */
              nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                 NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

              /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
              nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                    sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                    &my_pool,
                                    NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {
                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }
         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
         again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);
     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3523">TCP bağlantı noktasındaki istemci bağlantısını yeniden dinle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3523">Re-listen for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3524">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3524">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,

```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3548">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3615">TCP bağlantı noktasındaki istemci bağlantısını dinlemeyi devre dışı bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3615">Disable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3616">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3616">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3617">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3617">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3618">Bu hizmet, belirtilen TCP bağlantı noktasındaki istemci bağlantı isteğini dinlemeyi devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3618">This service disables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3619">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3620">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3620">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3621">**bağlantı noktası** Dinlemeyi devre dışı bırakılacak bağlantı noktası sayısı (0 ile 0xFFFF arasında).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3621">**port** Number of port to disable listening (0 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3622">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3622">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3623">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı TCP dinlemesi devre dışı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3623">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP listen disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) dinleme, belirtilen bağlantı noktası için etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Listening was not enabled for the specified port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3625">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) geçersiz bağlantı noktası belirtildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3625">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3629">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3629">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3630">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3630">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3631">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3631">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3632">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3632">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3633">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3633">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL       my_pool;
NX_IP                my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET        server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

     /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
     tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{

     /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
        doesn't use this callback.*/
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

     /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
        of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
       "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
     */

     /* Create the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

     /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                 port_12_connect_request);

     /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
        each client and then disconnecting. */
     for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
     {

         /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request is
            present. */
         tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

         /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to complete.*/
         status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

         /* Check for a successful connection. */
         if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
         {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"), &my_pool,
                                   NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
          }

          /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even if
             disconnect or accept fails. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

          /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
  
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>

```c
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3660">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3660">Description</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3702">TCP istemcisi veya sunucu yuvası oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3702">Create TCP client or server socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3703">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    CHAR *name, 
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG window_size,
    VOID (*urgent_data_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr),
    VOID (*disconnect_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3704">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3705">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için bir TCP istemcisi veya sunucu yuvası oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3705">This service creates a TCP client or server socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3706">*Uygulama geri çağırma yordamları, bu IP örneğiyle ilişkili iş parçacığından çağırılır*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3706">*Application callback routines are called from the thread associated with this IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3707">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3708">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3708">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3709">**socket_ptr** Yeni TCP yuvası denetim bloğu işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3709">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new TCP socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3710">**ad** Bu TCP yuvasının uygulama adı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3710">**name** Application name for this TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3711">**Type_of_service** İletim için hizmet türünü tanımlar, yasal değerler aşağıdaki gibidir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3711">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3717">**parça** IP fragmenting izin verilip verilmeyeceğini belirtir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3717">**fragment** Specifies whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3718">NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY \* \* (0x0) belirtilirse, IP fragmenting izin verilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3718">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3719">NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) belirtilirse, IP fragmenting devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3719">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3720">**Time_to_live** Bu paketin oluşturulmadan önce kaç yönlendirici geçebileceğini tanımlayan 8 bitlik değeri belirtir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3720">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3721">Varsayılan değer NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE tarafından belirtilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3721">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3722">**window_size** Bu yuva için alma sırasında izin verilen en fazla bayt sayısını tanımlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3722">**window_size** Defines the maximum number of bytes allowed in the receive queue for this socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Alma akışında acil verilerin her ne zaman algılandığına çağrılan uygulama işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Application function that is called whenever urgent data is detected in the receive stream.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3724">Bu değer NX_NULL, acil veriler yok sayılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3724">If this value is NX_NULL, urgent data is ignored.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3725">**disconnect_callback** Bağlantının diğer ucundaki yuva tarafından her bir bağlantı kesilmesi verildiğinde çağrılan uygulama işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3725">**disconnect_callback** Application function that is called whenever a disconnect is issued by the socket at the other end of the connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3726">Bu değer NX_NULL ise, bağlantıyı kes geri çağırma işlevi devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3726">If this value is NX_NULL, the disconnect callback function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3727">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3727">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı TCP istemci yuvası oluşturma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP client socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) geçersiz hizmet türü, parça, geçersiz pencere boyutu veya zaman tolive seçeneği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, invalid window size, or time-tolive option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3733">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3733">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3734">Başlatma ve Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3734">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3735">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3735">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3736">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3736">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3737">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3737">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a TCP client socket on the previously created IP instance,
   with normal delivery, IP fragmentation enabled, 0x80 time to
   live, a 200-byte receive window, no urgent callback routine, and
   the "client_disconnect" routine to handle disconnection initiated
   from the other end of the connection. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_create(&ip_0, &client_socket,
                             "Client Socket",
                             NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                             0x80, 200, NX_NULL
                             client_disconnect);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is created and ready
   to be bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3762">TCP yuvasını Sil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3762">Delete TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3763">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_delete(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3764">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3765">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulmuş bir TCP yuvasını siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3765">This service deletes a previously created TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3766">Yuva hala bağlı veya bağlı ise, hizmet bir hata kodu döndürür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3766">If the socket is still bound or connected, the service returns an error code.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3767">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3768">**socket_ptr** Önceden oluşturulmuş TCP yuvası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3768">**socket_ptr** Previously created TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3769">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva silme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) yuva oluşturulmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) Socket was not created.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) yuva hala bağımlı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3776">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3777">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3777">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3780">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created TCP client socket. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3805">İstemci ve sunucu yuvası bağlantılarının bağlantısını kes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3805">Disconnect client and server socket connections</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3806">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3806">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3807">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3808">Bu hizmet, kurulan bir istemci veya sunucu yuvası bağlantısını keser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3808">This service disconnects an established client or server socket connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3809">Sunucu yuvasının bağlantısının kesilmesi, geri kabul edilmemiş bir istek gelmelidir, ancak bağlantısı kesilen bir istemci yuvası, başka bir bağlantı isteği için bir durumda bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3809">A disconnect of a server socket should be followed by an unaccept request, while a client socket that is disconnected is left in a state ready for another connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3810">Bağlantıyı kesme işlemi hemen tamamlanmazsa, hizmet sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3810">If the disconnect process cannot finish immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3811">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3812">**socket_ptr** Daha önce bağlı olan istemci veya sunucu yuvası örneği işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3812">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3813">**wait_option** Bağlantının kesilmesi devam ederken hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3813">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the disconnection is in progress.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3814">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3814">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3817">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3817">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3818">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3818">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlantısı kesilemedi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket disconnect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) belirtilen yuva bağlı değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Specified socket is not connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) bağlantı kesilmesi devam ediyor, hiçbir bekleme belirtilmedi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Disconnect is in progress, no wait was specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3826">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3827">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3827">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3828">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3828">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3829">Yes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3829">Yes</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3830">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3830">Example</span></span> 

```c
/* Disconnect from a previously established connection and wait a
   maximum of 400 timer ticks. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&client_socket, 400);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously connected socket (either
   as a result of the client socket connect or the server accept) is
   disconnected. */
```
