## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3855">TCP bağlantı kesmeyi yüklemeyi bildirme geri çağırma işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3855">Install TCP disconnect complete notify callback function</span></span>
 
### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3856">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3856">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_disconnect_complete_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3857">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3858">Bu hizmet, bir yuva bağlantı kesme işlemi tamamlandıktan sonra çağrılan bir geri arama işlevini kaydeder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3858">This service registers a callback function which is invoked after a socket disconnect operation is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3859">NetX Duo, ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** tanımlı seçeneği ile DERLENIP, TCP yuvası bağlantı kesme tamam geri çağırma işlevi kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3859">The TCP socket disconnect complete callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3860">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3861">**socket_ptr** Daha önce bağlı olan istemci veya sunucu yuvası örneği işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3861">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** Yüklenecek geri çağırma işlevi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** The callback function to be installed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3863">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3863">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) geri çağırma işlevi başarıyla kaydedildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registered the callback function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) genişletilmiş bildirim özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığı 'nda yerleşik değildir NX_PTR_ERROR \* \* (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3868">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3868">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3869">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3869">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3870">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3870">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3871">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3871">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3872">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3872">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the disconnect complete notify callback function. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(&client_socket,
                                                  callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3886">TCP kurma bildirimi geri aramasını ayarla işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3886">Set TCP establish notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3887">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3887">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_establish_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3888">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3889">Bu hizmet, bir TCP yuvası bağlantı yaptığında çağrılan bir geri arama işlevini kaydeder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3889">This service registers a callback function, which is called after a TCP socket makes a connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3890">NetX Duo tanımlı ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** seçeneği ile DERLENIP TCP yuvası oluşturma geri çağırma işlevi kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3890">The TCP socket establish callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3891">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3892">**socket_ptr** Daha önce bağlı olan istemci veya sunucu yuvası örneği işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3892">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Bir TCP bağlantısı kurulduktan sonra geri çağırma işlevi başlatıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback function invoked after a TCP connection is established.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3894">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3894">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00), bildirim işlevini başarıyla ayarlıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sets the notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) genişletilmiş bildirim özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığı 'nda yerleşik değildir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP, uygulama tarafından etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP has not been enabled by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3900">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3901">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3901">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3902">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3902">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3903">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3903">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3904">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3904">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer "callback" as the notify function NetX
   Duo will call when the connection is in the established state. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3919">TCP yuva etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3919">Retrieve information about TCP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3920">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3920">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_socket_state,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_window,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_window);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3921">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3922">Bu hizmet, belirtilen TCP yuvası örneği için TCP yuva etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3922">This service retrieves information about TCP socket activities for the specified TCP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3923">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3923">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3924">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3925">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3925">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Yuvada Gönderilen TCP paketlerinin toplam sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Yuvada Gönderilen TCP baytlarının toplam sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Yuvada alınan toplam TCP paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Yuvada alınan TCP baytlarının toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Toplam TCP paketi yeniden aktarımlar sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packet retransmissions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Yuvada sıraya alınan TCP paketlerinin toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued TCP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Yuvada sağlama toplamı hataları olan toplam TCP paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Yuvanın geçerli durumunun hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pointer to destination of the socket’s current state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Toplam iletim paketi sayısının hedefe yönelik işaretçisi, hala ACK için bekleyen sıraya alındı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pointer to destination of the total number of transmit packets still queued waiting for ACK.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Geçerli iletme penceresi boyutunun hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pointer to destination of the current transmit window size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Geçerli alma penceresi boyutunun hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pointer to destination of the current receive window size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3937">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3937">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP yuvası bilgilerinin alımı başarılı oldu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3942">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3943">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3944">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3945">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3946">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3946">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP socket information from previously created
   socket_0.*/
status = nx_tcp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &tcp_packets_sent,
                                &tcp_bytes_sent,
                                &tcp_packets_received,
                                &tcp_bytes_received,
                                &tcp_retransmit_packets,
                                &tcp_packets_queued,
                                &tcp_checksum_errors,
                                &tcp_socket_state,
                                &tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
                                &tcp_transmit_window,
                                &tcp_receive_window);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP socket information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3971">Yuvanın düzeyini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3971">Get MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3972">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3972">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-3973">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-3973">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva veya kaynak hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) çağıran bir iş parçacığı veya başlatma değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4033">Yuvanın düzeyini ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4033">Set MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4034">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4034">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4035">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4036">Bu hizmet, belirtilen yuvanın en büyük kesim boyutunu (Bu) ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4036">This service sets the specified socket's Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4037">Bu değer, IP ve TCP üstbilgileri için odaya izin veren ağ arabirimi IP MTU 'SU içinde olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4037">Note the MSS value must be within the network interface IP MTU, allowing room for IP and TCP headers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4038">Bu hizmet, TCP yuvası bağlantı işlemini başlatılmadan önce kullanılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4038">This service should be used before a TCP socket starts the connection process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4039">Hizmet bir TCP bağlantısı kurulduktan sonra kullanılıyorsa, yeni değerin bağlantı üzerinde hiçbir etkisi olmaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4039">If the service is used after a TCP connection is established, the new value has no effect on the connection.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4040">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4041">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulmuş yuvanın işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4041">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4042"> , Ayarlanacak bir sahip değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4042">**mss** Value of MSS to set.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4043">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4043">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bir Wonu kümesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) belirtilen '% ' değeri çok büyük.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Specified MSS value is too large.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP bağlantısı kurulmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP connection has not been established</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) çağıran bir iş parçacığı veya başlatma değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4050">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4051">Başlatma ve iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4052">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4052">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4053">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4053">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4054">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4054">Example</span></span>

```c

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the MSS of "my_socket" is 1000 bytes. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4071">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4072">Bu hizmet, bağlı TCP yuvası için eş IP adresini ve bağlantı noktası bilgilerini IPv4 ağı üzerinden alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4072">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over IPv4 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4073">IPv6 ağını de destekleyen eşdeğer hizmet ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4073">The equivalent service that also supports IPv6 network is ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4074">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4075">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuvasına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4075">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4076">**peer_ip_address** Konak bayt düzeninde eş IP adresi hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4076">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to destination for peer IP address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4077">**peer_port** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde eş bağlantı noktası numarası için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4077">**peer_port** Pointer to destination for peer port number, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4078">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4078">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) hizmeti başarıyla çalıştırılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4080">Eş IP adresi ve bağlantı noktası numarası çağırana döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4080">Peer IP address and port number are returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) yuva bağlı durumda değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4104">TCP iletme sırası bildirim işlevini ayarlama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4104">Set the TCP transmit queue notify function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4105">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(
              NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
              VOID(*tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4106">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4107">Bu hizmet, uygulama tarafından belirtilen iletim sırası derinliği güncelleştirme bildirim işlevini ayarlar ve bu, belirtilen yuva, sıra derinliğinin artık sınırını aşmaması gibi, iletim sırasından paket yayımladığını belirlediğinde çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4107">This service sets the transmit queue depth update notify function specified by the application, which is called whenever the specified socket determines that it has released packets from the transmit queue such that the queue depth is no longer exceeding its limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4108">Sıra derinliği nedeniyle bir uygulama aktarım sırasında engelleniyorsa, geri çağırma işlevi uygulamaya yeniden iletim başlayabileceği bir bildirim görevi görür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4108">If an application would be blocked on transmit due to queue depth, the callback function serves as a notification to the application that it may start transmitting again.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4109">Bu hizmet yalnızca NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** seçeneği ile derlenip kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4109">This service is available only if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4110">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4110">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4111">**socket_ptr** Yuva yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4111">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the socket structure</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** Yüklenecek bildirim işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** The notify function to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4113">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4113">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00), bildirim işlevini başarıyla yükledi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) TCP yuva kuyruğu derinlik bildirimi özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The TCP socket queue depth notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) yuva denetim bloğu veya bildirim Işlevi için geçersiz işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to the socket control block or the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4119">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4119">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4120">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4120">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4121">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4121">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4122">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4122">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4123">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4123">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* Notify the application to resume sending. */

}
/* Install the TCP transmit queue notify function .*/
status = nxd_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(&tcp_socket,
                                  tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the callback function is successfully
   installed. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4138">TCP yuvasından veri al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4138">Receive data from TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4139">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4139">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4140">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4141">Bu hizmet, belirtilen yuvadan TCP verileri alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4141">This service receives TCP data from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4142">Belirtilen yuvada hiçbir veri sıraya alınmaz, çağıran, sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4142">If no data is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4143">*NX_SUCCESS döndürülürse, uygulama artık gerekli olmadığında alınan paketi serbest bırakmaktan sorumludur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4143">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4144">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4145">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4145">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4146">**packet_ptr** TCP paket işaretçisine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4146">**packet_ptr** Pointer to TCP packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4147">**wait_option** Şu anda bu yuvada sıraya alınmış veriler varsa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4147">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if do data are currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4148">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4148">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4151">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4151">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4152">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4152">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva verileri alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket data receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva henüz bağlanmamış.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound yet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) veri alınmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No data received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) yuva artık bağlı değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) The socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva veya dönüş paketi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4161">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4161">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4162">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4162">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4163">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4163">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4164">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4164">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4165">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4165">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from the previously created and connected TCP
   client socket. If no packet is available, wait for 200 timer
   ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive(&client_socket, &packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received packet is pointed to by
   "packet_ptr". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4190">Alınan paketlerin uygulamasına bildirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4190">Notify application of received packets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4191">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4191">Prototype</span></span>   

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    VOID (*tcp_receive_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4192">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4192">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4193">Bu hizmet, bildirim al işlev işaretçisini uygulama tarafından belirtilen geri çağırma işleviyle yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4193">This service configures the receive notify function pointer with the callback function specified by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4194">Bu geri çağırma işlevi, daha sonra yuvada bir veya daha fazla paket alındığında çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4194">This callback function is then called whenever one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4195">NX_NULL bir işaretçi sağlanırsa, bildir işlevi devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4195">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4196">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4197">**socket_ptr** TCP yuvasına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4197">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Yuvada bir veya daha fazla paket alındığında çağrılan uygulama geri çağırma işlev işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4199">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4199">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva alma bildirimi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive notify.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4204">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4205">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4205">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4206">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4206">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4207">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4207">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4208">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4208">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "client_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(&client_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever one or more packets are received for
   "client_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4223">TCP yuvası üzerinden veri gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4223">Send data through a TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4224">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4224">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_send(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4225">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4225">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4226">Bu hizmet, TCP verilerini daha önce bağlı bir TCP yuvası üzerinden gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4226">This service sends TCP data through a previously connected TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4227">Alıcının en son tanıtılan pencere boyutu bu istekten azsa, hizmet isteğe bağlı olarak, belirtilen bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4227">If the receiver's last advertised window size is less than this request, the service optionally suspends based on the wait option specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4228">Bu hizmet, IP katmanına, \ ' dan daha büyük bir paket verisi gönderilmesini güvence altına alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4228">This service guarantees that no packet data larger than MSS is sent to the IP layer.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4229">*Bir hata döndürülmediği takdirde, uygulama bu çağrıdan sonra paketi serbest bırakmamalıdır. Bunu yapmak öngörülemeyen sonuçlara neden olur çünkü ağ sürücüsü iletim sonrasında paketi serbest bırakmaya da* çalışacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4229">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will also try to release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4230">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4231">**socket_ptr** Daha önce bağlı TCP yuvası örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4231">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP veri paketi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4233">**wait_option** İstek alıcının pencere boyutundan fazlaysa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4233">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the request is greater than the window size of the receiver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4234">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4234">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4237">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4237">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4238">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva gönderme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva herhangi bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) uygun giden arabirim bulunamadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) yuva artık bağlı değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) isteği, alıcının tanıtılan pencere boyutundan bayt cinsinden daha büyük.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) Request is greater than receiver’s advertised window size in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) paketi ayrılmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) en yüksek iletim sırası derinliğine ulaşıldı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Maximum transmit queue depth has been reached.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) paket ekleme işaretçisi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) paket önüne işaretçisi geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Packet prepend pointer is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4252">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4252">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4253">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4253">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4254">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4254">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4255">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4255">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4256">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4256">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a packet out on the previously created and connected TCP
   socket. If the receive window on the other side of the connection
   is less than the packet size, wait 200 timer ticks before giving
   up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been sent! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_state_wait"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4281">TCP yuvasının belirli bir durumu girmesini bekleyin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4281">Wait for TCP socket to enter specific state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4282">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4282">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT desired_state,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4283">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4283">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4284">Bu hizmet, yuvanın istenen durumu girmesini bekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4284">This service waits for the socket to enter the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4285">Yuva istenen durumda değilse, hizmet sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alınır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4285">If the socket is not in the desired state, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4286">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4286">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4287">**socket_ptr** Daha önce bağlı TCP yuvası örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4287">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4288">**desired_state** İstenen TCP durumu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4288">**desired_state** Desired TCP state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4289">Geçerli TCP yuvası durumları şu şekilde tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4289">Valid TCP socket states are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4301">**wait_option** İstenen durum yoksa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4301">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested state is not present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4302">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4302">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4304">Tick (0x00000001 ile 0xFFFFFFFF) **zaman aşımı değeri**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4304">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4305">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4305">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı durum bekleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful state wait.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) belirtilen bekleme süresi içinde mevcut değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) State not present within the specified wait time.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) istenen yuva durumu geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) The desired socket state is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4313">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4314">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4314">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4315">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4315">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4316">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4316">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4317">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4317">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 300 timer ticks for the previously created socket to enter
   the established state in the TCP state machine. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(&client_socket,
                                  NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket is now in the established
   state! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4342">Zamanlanmış bekleme durumu için geri çağırma 'yi yükler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4342">Install callback for timed wait state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4343">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4343">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_timed_wait_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4344">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4345">Bu hizmet, TCP yuvası zamanlanmış bekleme durumunda olduğunda çağrılan bir geri arama işlevini kaydeder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4345">This service registers a callback function which is invoked when the TCP socket is in timed wait state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4346">Bu hizmeti kullanmak için NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** seçeneği ile oluşturulmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4346">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4347">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4348">**socket_ptr** Daha önce bağlı olan istemci veya sunucu yuvası örneği işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4348">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** Zamanlanmış geri çağırma işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** The timed wait callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4350">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4350">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) geri çağırma Işlevi yuvasını başarıyla kaydeder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registers the callback function socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) NETX Duo kitaplığı, genişletilmiş bildirim özelliği etkin olmadan oluşturulmuştur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) NetX Duo library is built without the extended notify feature enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4356">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4375">Yuvanın iletim parametrelerini Yapılandır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4375">Configure socket's transmit parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4376">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG max_queue_depth,
    ULONG timeout,
    ULONG max_retries,
    ULONG timeout_shift);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4377">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4378">Bu hizmet, belirtilen TCP yuvasının çeşitli iletim parametrelerini yapılandırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4378">This service configures various transmit parameters of the specified TCP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4379">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4379">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4380">**socket_ptr** TCP yuvasına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4380">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4381">**max_queue_depth** İletim için sıraya izin verilen en fazla paket sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4381">**max_queue_depth** Maximum number of packets allowed to be queued for transmission.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4382">**zaman aşımı** Paket yeniden gönderilmeden önce bir ACK değeri için ThreadX Zamanlayıcı onay işareti sayısı bekleniyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4382">**timeout** Number of ThreadX timer ticks an ACK is waited for before the packet is sent again.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4383">**max_retries** İzin verilen en fazla yeniden deneme sayısı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4383">**max_retries** Maximum number of retries allowed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4384">**timeout_shift** Sonraki yeniden denemelerde zaman aşımını kaydırmak için değer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4384">**timeout_shift** Value to shift the timeout for each subsequent retry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4385">0 değeri, sonraki yeniden denemeler arasındaki aynı zaman aşımı ile sonuçlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4385">A value of 0, results in the same timeout between successive retries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4386">1 değeri, yeniden denemeler arasındaki zaman aşımını iki katına çıkarır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4386">A value of 1, doubles the timeout between retries.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4387">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4387">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı iletme yuvası yapılandırması.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit socket configure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) sıra derinliği seçeneği geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid queue depth option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4393">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4394">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4394">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4395">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4395">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4396">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4397">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4397">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure the "client_socket" for a maximum transmit queue depth of
   12, 100 tick timeouts, a maximum of 20 retries, and a timeout double
   on each successive retry. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(&client_socket,12,100,20,1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket’s transmit retry has been
   configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4412">Pencere boyutu güncelleştirmelerinin uygulamasını bilgilendir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4412">Notify application of window size updates</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4413">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_window_update_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4414">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4415">Bu hizmet, bir yuva penceresi güncelleştirme geri arama yordamını yüklüyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4415">This service installs a socket window update callback routine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4416">Bu yordam, belirtilen yuva uzak konağın pencere boyutunda bir artışı gösteren bir paket aldığında otomatik olarak çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4416">This routine is called automatically whenever the specified socket receives a packet indicating an increase in the window size of the remote host.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4417">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4417">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4418">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuvasına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4418">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Pencere boyutu değiştiğinde çağrılacak geri arama yordamı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback routine to be called when the window size changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4420">NULL değeri, pencere değişikliğini güncelleştirmeyi devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4420">A value of NULL disables the window change update.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4421">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4421">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) geri çağırma yordamı yuvaya yüklendi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Callback routine is installed on the socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4426">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4427">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4427">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4428">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4428">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4429">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4429">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4430">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4430">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer to the windows update callback after creating the
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(&data_socket,
                                                my_windows_update_callback);

/* Define the window callback function in the host application. */
void my_windows_update_callback(&data_socket)
{

/* Process update on increase TCP transmit socket window size. */
   return;
}
```

## <a name="nx_udp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4444">nx_udp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4444">nx_udp_enable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4446">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4446">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4447">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4448">Bu hizmet, NetX Duo 'un Kullanıcı Datagram Protokolü (UDP) bileşenini sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4448">This service enables the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4449">Etkinleştirildikten sonra, uygulama tarafından UDP veri birimleri gönderilebilir ve alınabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4449">After enabled, UDP datagrams may be sent and received by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4450">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4450">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4451">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4451">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
