## <a name="nx_udp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4485">Sonraki kullanılabilir UDP bağlantı noktasını bul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4485">Find next available UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4486">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4486">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4487">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4488">Bu hizmet, uygulama tarafından sağlanan bağlantı noktası numarasından başlayarak ücretsiz bir UDP bağlantı noktası (ilişkisiz) arar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4488">This service looks for a free UDP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4489">Arama mantığı, en fazla 0xFFFF bağlantı noktası değerine ulaşırsa, arama mantığı sarmalacaktır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4489">The search logic will wrap around if the search reaches the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4490">Arama başarılı olursa, free_port_ptr tarafından işaret edilen değişkende boş bağlantı noktası döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4490">If the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by free_port_ptr.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4491">*Bu hizmet başka bir iş parçacığından çağrılabilir ve aynı bağlantı noktasına geri dönüş yapılabilir. Bu yarış durumunu engellemek için, uygulama bu hizmeti ve gerçek yuva bağlamasını bir mutex 'in altına yerleştirmek isteyebilir*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4491">*This service can be called from another thread and can have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4492">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4493">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4493">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4494">**bağlantı noktası** Aramaya başlamak için bağlantı noktası numarası (1 ile 0xFFFF arasında).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4494">**port** Port number to start search (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4495">**free_port_ptr** Hedef boş bağlantı noktası dönüş değişkenine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4495">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4496">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4496">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı boş bağlantı noktası bul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) boş bağlantı noktası bulunamadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) belirtilen bağlantı noktası numarası geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4503">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4504">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4504">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4505">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4505">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4506">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4506">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4507">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4507">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free UDP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS pointer, "free_port" identifies the next
   free UDP port on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4531">UDP etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4531">Retrieve information about UDP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4532">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4532">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4533">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4534">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için UDP etkinlikleriyle ilgili bilgileri alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4534">This service retrieves information about UDP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4535">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4535">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4536">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4537">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4537">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Gönderilen toplam UDP paketi sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Gönderilen toplam UDP bayt sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4540">**udp_packets_received** Alınan toplam UDP paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4540">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Alınan UDP baytlarının toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Toplam geçersiz UDP paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid UDP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Bırakılan UDP alma paketlerinin toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Toplam UDP paketi sayısının sağlama toplamı hataları olan hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4545">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı UDP bilgisi alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_udp_info_get(&ip_0, &udp_packets_sent,
                         &udp_bytes_sent,
                         &udp_packets_received,
                         &udp_bytes_received,
                         &udp_invalid_packets,
                         &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4578">UDP paketindeki ağ parametrelerini Ayıkla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4578">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4579">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4579">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4580">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4580">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4581">Bu hizmet, IPv4 adresi, eş bağlantı noktası numarası, protokol türü (Bu hizmet her zaman UDP türünü döndürür) gibi ağ parametrelerini, gelen bir arabirimde alınan bir paketten ayıklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4581">This service extracts network parameters, such as IPv4 address, peer port number, protocol type (this service always returns UDP type) from a packet received on an incoming interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4582">IPv4 veya IPv6 ağından gelen bir paket hakkında bilgi edinmek için, uygulama hizmeti ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract kullanacaktır.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4582">To obtain information on a packet coming from IPv4 or IPv6 network, application shall use the service ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4583">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4584">**packet_ptr** Paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4584">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4585">**ip_address** Gönderenin IP adresi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4585">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4586">**protokol** Protokol işaretçisi (UDP).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4586">**protocol** Pointer to protocol (UDP).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4587">**bağlantı noktası** Gönderenin bağlantı noktası numarası işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4587">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4588">**interface_index** Arabirim dizini alma işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4588">**interface_index** Pointer to receiving interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4589">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4589">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paket arabirimi verileri başarıyla ayıklandı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) paketi IPv4 çerçevesi içermiyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet does not contain IPv4 frame.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi girişi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4594">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4595">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4595">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4596">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4596">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4597">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4597">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4598">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4598">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nx_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                     &protocol, &port,
                                     &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4622">UDP yuvasını UDP bağlantı noktasına bağla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4622">Bind UDP socket to UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4623">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bind(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4624">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4625">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulan UDP yuvasını belirtilen UDP bağlantı noktasına bağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4625">This service binds the previously created UDP socket to the specified UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4626">Geçerli UDP yuvaları 0 ile 0xFFFF arasındadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4626">Valid UDP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4627">İstenen bağlantı noktası numarası başka bir yuvaya bağlıysa, bu hizmet, yuvanın bağlantı noktası numarasından bağlantısını kesmek için belirtilen süre boyunca bekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4627">If the requested port number is bound to another socket, this service waits for specified period of time for the socket to unbind from the port number.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4628">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4628">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4629">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4629">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4630">**bağlantı noktası** \* \* (1 ile 0xFFFF arasında) bağlamak için bağlantı noktası numarası.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4630">**port** Port number to bind to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4631">Bağlantı noktası numarası NX_ANY_PORT \* \* (0x0000) ise, IP örneği sonraki boş bağlantı noktasını arar ve bu bağlantıyı bağlama için kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4631">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4632">**wait_option** Bağlantı noktası zaten başka bir yuvaya bağlanmışsa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4632">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4633">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4633">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4636">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4636">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4637">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4637">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlaması.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) bu yuva zaten başka bir bağlantı noktasına bağlıydı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) bağlantı noktası zaten farklı bir yuvaya bağlıydı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) boş bağlantı noktası yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) geçersiz bağlantı noktası belirtildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4651">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4651">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind the previously created UDP socket to port 12 on the
   previously created IP instance. If the port is already bound,
   wait for 300 timer ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bind(&udp_socket, 12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the UDP socket is now bound to
   port 12.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4675">Alma için kullanılabilir bayt sayısını alır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4675">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4676">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4676">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4677">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4678">Bu hizmet, belirtilen UDP yuvasında alım için kullanılabilen bayt sayısını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4678">This service retrieves number of bytes available for reception in the specified UDP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4679">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4679">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4680">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuvasına yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4680">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4681">**bytes_available** Kullanılabilir baytlar için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4681">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4682">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4682">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı bayt kullanılabilir alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4683">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful bytes available retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) yuva bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4684">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4685">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP özelliği etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4686">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4687">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4688">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4689">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4689">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4690">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4690">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4691">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4691">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4692">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4692">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval from the UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,
                                       &bytes_available);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the number of bytes was successfully
   retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4716">UDP yuvası için sağlama toplamını devre dışı bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4716">Disable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4717">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4717">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4718">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4718">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4719">Bu hizmet, belirtilen UDP yuvasında paketleri göndermek ve almak için sağlama toplamı mantığını devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4719">This service disables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4720">Sağlama toplamı mantığı devre dışı bırakıldığında, bu yuva aracılığıyla gönderilen tüm paketler için UDP üstbilgisinin sağlama toplamı alanına sıfır değeri yüklenir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4720">When the checksum logic is disabled, a value of zero is loaded into the UDP header's checksum field for all packets sent through this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4721">UDP üst bilgisindeki sıfır değerli sağlama toplamı değeri, bu paket için sağlama toplamı hesaplanmayan alıcıyı işaret eder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4721">A zero-value checksum value in the UDP header signals the  receiver that checksum is not computed for this packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4722">Ayrıca, **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** ve **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** , sırasıyla UDP paketlerini alırken ve gönderirken tanımlanmadığında bunun bir etkisi olmadığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4722">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively,</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4723">Bu hizmetin IPv6 ağı üzerinde, UDP sağlama toplamı IPv6 için zorunlu olduğundan bu hizmetin hiçbir etkisi olmadığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4723">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network since UDP checksum is mandatory for IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4724">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4725">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4725">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4726">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4726">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva sağlama toplamı devre dışı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4732">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4733">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, süreölçer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4733">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4734">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4735">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4736">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4736">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will not have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4760">UDP yuvası için sağlama toplamını etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4760">Enable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4761">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4761">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4762">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4762">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4763">Bu hizmet, belirtilen UDP yuvasında paket göndermek ve almak için sağlama toplamı mantığını sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4763">This service enables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4764">Sağlama toplamı, tüm UDP veri alanının yanı sıra sözde IP üst bilgisini de içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4764">The checksum covers the entire UDP data area as well as a pseudo IP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4765">Ayrıca, **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** ve **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** , sırasıyla UDP paketlerini alırken ve gönderirken tanımlanmış bir etkiye sahip olmadığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4765">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4766">Bu hizmetin IPv6 ağındaki paketleri üzerinde hiçbir etkisi olmadığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4766">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4767">UDP sağlama toplamı IPv6 'da zorunludur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4767">UDP checksum is mandatory in IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4768">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4769">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4769">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4770">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4770">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva sağlama toplamı etkin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4776">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4777">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, süreölçer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4777">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4778">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4779">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4780">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4804">UDP yuvası oluştur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4804">Create UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4805">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4805">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG queue_maximum);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4806">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4806">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4807">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için bir UDP yuvası oluşturur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4807">This service creates a UDP socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4808">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4808">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4809">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4809">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4810">**socket_ptr** Yeni UDP yuva denetimi Bloc işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4810">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new UDP socket control bloc.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4811">**ad** Bu UDP yuvasının uygulama adı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4811">**name** Application name for this UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4812">**Type_of_service** İletim için hizmet türünü tanımlar, yasal değerler aşağıdaki gibidir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4812">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4818">**parça** IP fragmenting izin verilip verilmeyeceğini belirtir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4818">**fragment Specifies** whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4819">NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) belirtilmişse, IP fragmenting izin verilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4819">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4820">NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) belirtilirse, IP fragmenting devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4820">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4821">**Time_to_live** Bu paketin oluşturulmadan önce kaç yönlendirici geçebileceğini tanımlayan 8 bitlik değeri belirtir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4821">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4822">Varsayılan değer NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE tarafından belirtilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4822">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4823">**queue_maximum** Bu yuva için sıraya alınabilen en fazla UDP veri birimi sayısını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4823">**queue_maximum** Defines the maximum number of UDP datagrams that can be queued for this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4824">Kuyruk sınırına ulaşıldığında, alınan her yeni paket için en eski UDP paketi yayımlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4824">After the queue limit is reached, for every new packet received the oldest UDP packet is released.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4825">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4825">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı UDP yuvası oluşturma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0X0a) geçersiz hizmet türü, parça veya yaşam süresi seçeneği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, or time-to-live option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP veya yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4831">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4831">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4832">Başlatma ve Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4832">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4833">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4833">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4834">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4834">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4835">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4835">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a UDP socket with a maximum receive queue of 30 packets.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_create(&ip_0, &udp_socket, "Sample UDP Socket",
                              NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY, 0x80,
                              30);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the new UDP socket has been created and
   is ready for binding. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4859">UDP yuvasını Sil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4859">Delete UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4860">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4860">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_delete(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4861">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4862">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulmuş bir UDP yuvasını siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4862">This service deletes a previously created UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4863">Yuva bir bağlantı noktasına bağlıysa, önce yuvanın bağlantısı kaldırılmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4863">If the socket was bound to a port, the socket must be unbound first.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4864">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4865">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4865">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4866">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4866">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva silme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) yuva hala bağımlı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4872">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4872">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4873">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4873">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4874">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4874">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4875">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4875">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4876">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4876">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_delete(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created UDP socket has
   been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4900">UDP yuva etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alın</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4900">Retrieve information about UDP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_info_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4902">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4903">Bu hizmet, belirtilen UDP yuva örneği için UDP yuva etkinlikleri hakkında bilgi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4903">This service retrieves information about UDP socket activities for the specified UDP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4904">*Hedef işaretçi NX_NULL, bu belirli bilgiler çağırana döndürülmez*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4904">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4905">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4906">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4906">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Yuvada gönderilen toplam UDP paketi sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Yuvada gönderilen UDP baytlarının toplam sayısı için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4909">**udp_packets_received** Yuvada alınan UDP paketlerinin toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Yuvada alınan UDP baytlarının toplam sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Yuva üzerindeki toplam sıraya alınmış UDP paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued UDP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Sıra boyutunun aşılması nedeniyle yuva için bırakılan toplam UDP alma paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped for socket due to queue size being exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Yuvada sağlama toplamı hataları olan toplam UDP paketi sayısının hedefi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4914">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4914">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı UDP yuvası bilgileri alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4919">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4919">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4920">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları ve zamanlayıcılar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4920">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4921">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4921">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4922">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4922">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4923">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4923">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP socket information from socket 0.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &udp_packets_sent,
                                &udp_bytes_sent,
                                &udp_packets_received,
                                &udp_bytes_received,
                                &udp_queued_packets,
                                &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                                &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP socket information was retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4947">UDP yuvasına göre bağlantı noktası numarasını seçin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4947">Pick up port number bound to UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4948">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4948">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_port_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4949">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4950">Bu hizmet, yuvanın bağlandığı zamanda NX_ANY_PORT belirtildiği durumlarda NetX Duo tarafından ayrılan bağlantı noktasını bulmak için yararlı olan yuva ile ilişkili bağlantı noktası numarasını alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4950">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4951">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4952">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4952">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4953">**port_ptr** Dönüş bağlantı noktası numarası için hedef işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4953">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4954">Geçerli bağlantı noktası numaraları (1-0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4954">Valid port numbers are (1- 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4955">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4955">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlaması.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) bu yuva bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmamış.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi veya bağlantı noktası döndürme işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4961">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4961">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4962">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4962">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4963">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4963">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4964">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4964">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4965">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4965">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of created and bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_port_get(&udp_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4989">UDP yuvasından veri birimi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4989">Receive datagram from UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4990">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4991">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4992">Bu hizmet, belirtilen yuvadan bir UDP veri birimi alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4992">This service receives an UDP datagram from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4993">Belirtilen yuvada hiçbir veri birimi sıraya alınmaz, çağıran, sağlanan bekleme seçeneğine göre askıya alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4993">If no datagram is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4994">*NX_SUCCESS döndürülürse, uygulama artık gerekli olmadığında alınan paketi serbest bırakmaktan sorumludur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4994">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4995">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4995">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4996">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4996">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4997">**packet_ptr** UDP veri birimi paket işaretçisine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4997">**packet_ptr** Pointer to UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4998">**wait_option** Bir veri birimi şu anda bu yuvada sıraya alınmışsa hizmetin nasıl davranacağını tanımlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4998">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if a datagram is not currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-4999">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-4999">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5002">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5002">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5003">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5003">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva alma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva herhangi bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) almak için UDP veri birimi yoktu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) There was no UDP datagram to receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva veya paket döndürme işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5011">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5012">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5012">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5013">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5013">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5014">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5014">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5015">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5015">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from a previously created and bound UDP socket.
   If no packets are currently available, wait for 500 timer ticks
   before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive(&udp_socket, &packet_ptr, 500);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received UDP packet is pointed to by
   packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5039">Alınan her paketin uygulamasını bilgilendir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5039">Notify application of each received packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5040">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5040">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*udp_receive_notify)(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5041">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5041">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5042">Bu hizmet, bildirim al işlev işaretçisini uygulama tarafından belirtilen geri çağırma işlevine ayarlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5042">This service sets the receive notify function pointer to the callback function specified by the  application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5043">Bu geri çağırma işlevi, yuva üzerinde her paket alındığında çağrılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5043">This callback function is then called whenever a packet is received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5044">NX_NULL bir işaretçi sağlanırsa, alma bildirme işlevi devre dışı bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5044">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the receive notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5045">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5046">**socket_ptr** UDP yuvasının işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5046">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Yuvada bir paket alındığında çağrılan uygulama geri çağırma işlev işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when a packet is received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5048">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5048">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) yuva alma bildirim işlevini başarıyla ayarladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set socket receive notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5051">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5052">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar ve ISRs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5052">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5053">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5053">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5054">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5054">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5055">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5055">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "udp_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(&udp_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever a packet is received for
   "udp_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5079">UDP veri birimi gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5079">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5080">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5080">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5081">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5082">Bu hizmet, IPv4 ağları için önceden oluşturulmuş ve bağlantılı bir UDP yuvası aracılığıyla bir UDP datagramı gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5082">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for IPv4 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5083">NetX Duo, hedef IP adresini temel alarak kaynak adresi olarak uygun bir yerel IP adresi bulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5083">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5084">Belirli bir arabirim ve kaynak IP adresi belirtmek için, uygulamanın  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** hizmetini kullanması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5084">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5085">Bu hizmetin UDP veri biriminin başarıyla gönderilip gönderilmediğini ne olursa olsun, hemen geri dönmediğine unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5085">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5086">NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) eşdeğer hizmeti ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5086">The NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) equivalent service is ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5087">Yuva yerel bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5087">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5088">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5089">**socket_ptr** Önceden oluşturulan UDP yuva örneği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5089">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP veri birimi paket işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5090">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5091">**ip_address** Hedef IPv4 adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5091">**ip_address** Destination IPv4 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5092">**bağlantı noktası** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde geçerli hedef bağlantı noktası numarası 1 ile 0xFFFF arasında)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5092">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5093">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5093">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı UDP yuvası gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5094">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva herhangi bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5095">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) uygun bir giden arabirim bulunamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5096">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) GEÇERSIZ sunucu IP adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5097">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) paketteki UDP üst bilgisi için yeterli yer yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) paket ekleme işaretçisi geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5101">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5102">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) bağlantı noktası numarası geçerli bir Aralık içinde değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5103">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5104">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5104">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5105">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5105">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5106">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5106">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5107">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5107">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5108">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5108">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IP address. */
server_address = IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5);

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nx_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                            server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the application successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to its peer. */
```
