## <a name="nx_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5132">UDP yuvası üzerinden veri birimi gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5132">Send datagram through UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5133">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5133">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    UINT port,
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5134">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5135">Bu hizmet, kaynak adresi olarak belirtilen IP adresine sahip ağ arabirimi aracılığıyla daha önce oluşturulmuş ve bağlantılı bir UDP yuvası aracılığıyla bir UDP datagramı gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5135">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket through the network interface with the specified IP address as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5136">UDP veri biriminin başarıyla gönderilip gönderilmediğini ne olursa olsun hizmetin hemen geri döndüğünü unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5136">Note that service returns immediately, regardless of whether or not the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** hem IPv4 hem de IPv6 ağlarında çalışmaktadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** works for both IPv4 and IPv6 networks.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5138">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5138">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5139">**socket_ptr** Paketin üzerine iletilmesi için yuva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket to transmit the packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5140">**packet_ptr** İletilecek paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5140">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5141">**ip_address** Paketin gönderileceği hedef IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5141">**ip_address** Destination IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5142">**bağlantı noktası** Hedef bağlantı noktası.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5142">**port** Destination port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5143">**address_index** Paketin gönderileceği arabirimle ilişkili adresin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5143">**address_index** Index of the address associated with the interface to send packet on.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5144">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) paketi başarıyla gönderildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IP adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP işleme etkin değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) geçersiz paket ekleme işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) geçersiz paket önüne işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz adres dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid address index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) bağlantı noktası numarası en fazla bağlantı noktası numarasını aşıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number exceeds maximum port number.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5155">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5156">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5156">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5157">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5157">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5158">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5158">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5159">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5159">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_INDEX 1

/* Send packet out on port 80 to the specified destination IP on the
   interface at index 1 in the IP task interface list. */
status = nx_udp_socket_source_send(socket_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                   destination_ip, 80,
                                   ADDRESS_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet was successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5183">UDP bağlantı noktasından gelen UDP yuvasının bağlantısını kaldır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5183">Unbind UDP socket from UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5184">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5184">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_unbind(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5185">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5185">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5186">Bu hizmet, UDP yuvası ile UDP bağlantı noktası arasındaki bağlamayı yayınlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5186">This service releases the binding between the UDP socket and a UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5187">Alma sırasında depolanan tüm alınan paketler, ciltten çıkarma işleminin bir parçası olarak serbest bırakılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5187">Any received packets stored in the receive queue are released as part of the unbind operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5188">İlişkisiz bağlantı noktasına başka bir yuva bağlamayı bekleyen başka iş parçacıkları varsa, ilk askıya alınan iş parçacığı daha sonra yeni ilişkisiz bağlantı noktasına bağlanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5188">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the unbound port, the first suspended thread is then bound to the newly unbound port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5189">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5190">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan UDP yuva örneğine yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5191">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5191">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlantısı kesiliyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5192">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva herhangi bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5193">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Bu bileşen etkinleştirilmemiş.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5197">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5198">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5198">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5199">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5199">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5200">Yes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5200">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5201">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5201">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind the previously bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_unbind(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously bound socket is now
   unbound. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5225">UDP veri kaynağından IP ve gönderme bağlantı noktasını Ayıkla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5225">Extract IP and sending port from UDP datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5226">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5227">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5228">Bu hizmet, gönderenin IP ve bağlantı noktası numarasını, sağlanan UDP veri biriminin IP ve UDP üst bilgilerinden ayıklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5228">This service extracts the sender's IP and port number from the IP and UDP headers of the supplied UDP datagram.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5229">Hizmet ***Nxd_udp_source_extract*** IPv4 veya IPv6 ağından gelen paketlerle birlikte çalışıp çalışmadığını unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5229">Note that the service ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** works with packets from either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5230">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP veri birimi paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5232">**ip_address** Dönüş IP adresi değişkenine yönelik geçerli işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5232">**ip_address** Valid pointer to the return IP address variable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5233">**bağlantı noktası** Dönüş bağlantı noktası değişkenine geçerli işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5233">**port** Valid pointer to the return port variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5234">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5234">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı kaynak IP/bağlantı noktası ayıklama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source IP/port extraction.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) sağlanan paket geçersiz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) The supplied packet is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz paket veya IP veya bağlantı noktası hedefi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet or IP or port destination.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5239">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları, zamanlayıcılar, ıSR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5239">Initialization, threads, timers, ISR</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5240">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5240">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5241">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5242">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract the IP and port information from the sender of the UPD packet. */
status = nx_udp_source_extract(packet_ptr, &sender_ip_address, &sender_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the sender IP and port information has been stored
   in sender_ip_address and sender_port respectively.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5266">Icmpv4 ve ICMPv6 hizmetlerini etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5266">Enable ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5267">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5267">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5268">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5268">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5269">Bu hizmet her iki Icmpv4 ve ICMPv6 hizmetini de sunar ve yalnızca IP örneği oluşturulduktan sonra çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5269">This service enables both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services and can only be called after the IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5270">Hizmet, IPv6 etkinleştirilmeden önce ya da sonra etkinleştirilebilir (bkz. *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5270">The service can be enabled either before or after IPv6 is enabled (see *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5271">ICMPv4 Hizmetleri yankı Isteği/yanıtı içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5271">ICMPv4 services include Echo Request/Reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5272">ICMPv6 Hizmetleri yankı Isteği/yanıtı, komşu bulma, yinelenen adres algılama, yönlendirici bulma ve durum bilgisiz adresi otomatik yapılandırmasını içerir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5272">ICMPv6 services include Echo Request/Reply, Neighbor Discovery, Duplicate Address Detection, Router Discovery, and Stateless Address Auto-configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5273">NetX 'teki IPv4 eşdeğeri *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5273">The IPv4 equivalent in NetX is *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

> [!NOTE] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5274">*ICMPv6 etkinleştirilmeden önce IPv6 adresi el ile yapılandırıldıysa, el ile yapılandırılan IPv6, yinelenen adres algılama işlemine tabi değildir*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5274">*If the IPv6 address is manually configured prior to enabling ICMPv6, the manually configured IPv6 is not subject to Duplicate Address Detection process*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* yalnızca IPv4 IŞLEMLERI için ICMP hizmetlerini başlatır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* starts ICMP services for IPv4 operations only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5276">ICMPv6 hizmetlerini kullanan uygulamalar *nx_icmp_enable* yerine *nxd_icmp_enable* kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5276">Applications using ICMPv6 services must use *nxd_icmp_enable* instead of *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5277">IPv6 yönlendirici bağlantısı ve IPv6 durum bilgisiz otomatik adres yapılandırmasını kullanmak için, ICMPv6 etkinleştirilmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5277">To utilize IPv6 router solicitation and IPv6 stateless auto-address configuration, ICMPv6 must be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5278">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5278">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5279">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5279">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5280">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5280">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP hizmetleri başarıyla etkinleştirildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP services are successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5284">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5285">Başlatma, Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5285">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5286">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5287">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5288">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for ICMP services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5297">ICMPv4 veya ICMPv6 Yankı Istekleri gerçekleştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5297">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5298">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5298">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr, 
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5299">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5299">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5300">Bu hizmet uygun bir fiziksel arabirim aracılığıyla bir ıCMP yankı Isteği paketi gönderir ve hedef konaktan yankı yanıtı bekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5300">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet through an appropriate physical interface and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5301">NetX Duo, ping iletisini göndermek için hedef adrese göre uygun arabirimi belirler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5301">NetX Duo determines the appropriate interface, based on the destination address, to send the ping message .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5302">Uygulamalar, paket iletimi için kullanılacak fiziksel arabirimi ve kesin kaynak IP adresini belirtmek için hizmet ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** kullanır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5302">Applications shall use the service ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** to specify the physical interface and precise source IP address to use for packet transmission.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5303">IP örneğinin oluşturulmuş olması ve Icmpv4/ICMPv6 hizmetlerinin etkinleştirilmesi gerekir (bkz. ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5303">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4/ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5304">NX_SUCCESS döndürülürse, uygulama artık gerekli olmadığında alınan paketi serbest bırakmaktan sorumludur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5304">If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5305">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5306">**ip_ptr** IP örneği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5306">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5307">**ip_address** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde ping yapılacak hedef IP adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5307">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5308">**data_ptr** Paket veri alanı ping işlemi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5308">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5309">**data_size** Ping verisinin bayt sayısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5309">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5310">**response_ptr** Yanıt paketi Işaretçisi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5310">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet Pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5311">**wait_option** Yanıt için beklenecek süre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5311">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5312">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5312">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5314">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5314">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5316">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı gönderilen ve alınan ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) ping verileri paket yükünü aşıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5331">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5331">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send
   ping packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   2001:1234:5678::1 */
   
/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr,
                       NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been
   received from IP address 2001:1234:5678::1 and the response
   packet is contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr.It
   should have the same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4[0]    = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr, 10);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received
   from IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in
   the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same
   “abcd” four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_source_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5340">ICMPv4 veya ICMPv6 Yankı Istekleri gerçekleştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5340">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5341">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_source_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT address_index,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5342">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5343">Bu hizmet, bir IPv4 veya IPv6 adresinin belirtilen dizinini kullanarak ve kaynak adresin ilişkilendirildiği ağ arabiriminden bir ıCMP yankı Isteği paketi gönderir ve hedef konaktan bir yankı yanıtı bekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5343">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet using the specified index of an IPv4 or IPv6 address, and through the network interface the source address is associated with, and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5344">Bu hizmet hem IPv4 hem de IPv6 adresleriyle birlikte kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5344">This service works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5345">*Address_index* parametresi, kullanılacak kaynak IPv4 veya IPv6 adresini gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5345">The parameter *address_index* indicates the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5346">IPv4 adresi için *address_index* , ekli ağ arabirimine aynı dizindir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5346">For IPv4 address, the *address_index* is the same index to the attached network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5347">IPv6 için *Address_index* IPv6 adres tablosundaki girişi gösterir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5347">For IPv6, the *address_index* indicates the entry in the IPv6 address table.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5348">IP örneğinin oluşturulmuş olması gerekir ve Icmpv4 ve ICMPv6 hizmetlerinin etkinleştirilmesi gerekir (bkz. *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5348">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span></span>

> [!CAUTION] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5349">*NX_SUCCESS döndürülürse, uygulama artık gerekli olmadığında alınan paketi serbest bırakmaktan sorumludur*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5349">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5377">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5377">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send ping
   packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 */

/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
#define GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS 1

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0xFE800000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x00000000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0x04117B23;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 0x40DCF181;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been received
   from IP address FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 and the response packet is
   contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the
   same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4       = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received from
   IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in the packet
   pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same “abcd” four bytes
   of data. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5403">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5403">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID icmpv6_ra_flag_callback(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT ra_flag)
{
   /* RA flag has changed. The updated value is passed in via the
      ra_flag parameter. */
}

/* Configure the user-defined ICMPv6 RA flag change callback
   function. */
status = nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set(&ip_0,
                                         icmpv6_ra_flag_callback);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the callback function has
   been successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5412">Ham IP paketi gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5412">Send Raw IP Packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5413">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination
    ULONG protocol, 
    UINT ttl, 
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5414">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5415">Bu hizmet, bir ham IPv4 veya IPv6 paketi gönderir (Aktarım katmanı protokolü üstbilgileri yoktur).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5415">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet (no transport-layer protocol headers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5416">Çoklu ana sistemde, sistem uygun bir arabirimi tespit leyemiyorsa (örneğin, hedef IP adresi IPv4 yayını, çok noktaya yayın veya IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresi ise), birincil cihaz seçilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5416">On a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address), the primary device is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5417">\***Nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ hizmeti bir giden arabirim belirtmek için kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5417">The service \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ can be used to specify an outgoing interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5418">NetX eşdeğeri _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5418">The NetX equivalent is _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5419">IP örneğinin daha önce oluşturulması ve ham IP paket işlemenin ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** hizmeti kullanılarak etkinleştirilmiş olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5419">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5420">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5421">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5422">**packet_ptr** İletilecek paket işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5422">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5423">**destination_ip** Hedef adres işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5423">**destination_ip** Pointer to destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5424">**protokol** IP üst bilgisinde depolanan paket Protokolü</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5424">**protocol** Packet protocol stored to the IP header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5425">**TTL** TTL veya atlama sınırı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5425">**ttl** Value for TTL or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5426">**TOS** TOS veya trafik sınıfı ve akış etiketi için değer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5426">**tos** Value for TOS or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5427">Dönüş Değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5427">Return Value</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ham IP paketi başarıyla gönderildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Raw IP packet successfully sent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) uygun bir giden arabirim bulunamıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ham IP işleme etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP handling not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IPv4 veya IPv6 adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) pakette IPv4 veya IPv6 üst bilgisi için yeterli alan yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) paket ekleme işaretçisi geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi veya paket işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) geçerli IPv6 adresi girişi değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5437">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5437">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5438">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5438">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5439">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5439">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5440">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5440">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5441">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5441">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS dest_address;

/* Set the destination address,in this case an IPv6 address. */
dest_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

UINT ttl, tos;

ttl = 128;

tos = 0;

/* Enable RAW IP handling on the previously created IP instance.*/
status = nx_raw_ip_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* Allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr from the IP packet
   pool. */
/* Then transmit the packet to the destination address. */

status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr, dest_address,
                                NX_PROTOCOL_UDP, ttl, tos);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet was
   successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5452">Belirtilen kaynak adresini kullanarak ham paket gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5452">Send raw packet using specified source address</span></span>

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG protocol,
    UINT ttl,
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5454">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5455">Bu hizmet, kaynak adresi olarak belirtilen IPv4 veya IPv6 adresini kullanarak bir ham IPv4 veya IPv6 paketi gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5455">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet using the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address as source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5456">Bu hizmet genellikle, sistem uygun bir arabirimi tespit leyemiyorsa (örneğin, hedef IP adresi IPv4 yayını, çok noktaya yayın veya IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresi ise) çok ana bir sistemde kullanılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5456">This service is typically used on a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5457">*Address_index* parametresi, uygulamanın bu ham paketi gönderirken kullanılacak kaynak adresini belirtmesini sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5457">The parameter *address_index* allows the application to specify the source address to use when sending this raw packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5458">IP örneğinin daha önce oluşturulması ve ham IP paket işlemenin ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** hizmeti kullanılarak etkinleştirilmiş olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5458">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5460">**ip_ptr** IP örnek işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5460">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5481">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5481">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX 2

/* Send a raw packet from specified interface. */
status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                                       dest_ip,
                                       SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                       NX_IP_RAW,
                                       NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE,
                                       NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, raw packet has been sent out on the
   specified interface. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5492">IPv6 adres değişikliği bildirimi ayarla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5492">Set ipv6 address change notify</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5493">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5493">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*ip_address_change_notify)(NX_IP *, UINT, UINT, UINT, ULONG *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5494">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5495">Bu hizmet, IPv6 adresi her değiştirildiğinde NetX Duo 'un çağırdığı bir uygulama geri çağırma yordamını kaydeder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5495">This service registers an application callback routine that NetX Duo calls whenever the IPv6 Address is changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5496">NetX Duo kitaplığı derlenip bu hizmet kullanılabilir ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** tanımlı seçenektir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5496">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built is the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5497">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5497">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5498">**ip_ptr** IP denetim bloğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5498">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Uygulama geri çağırma işlevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Application callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5500">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5500">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5501">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı küme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5501">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 adres değişikliği bildirim özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 address change notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IPv6 adres değişikliği bildirimi derlenmedi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IPv6 address change notify is not compiled</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5506">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5507">İş Parçacığı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5507">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5508">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5509">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5510">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5510">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID ip_address_change_notify(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT status,
                              UINT interface_index,
                              UINT address_index,
                              ULONG *ip_address)
{

   /* Do something when ip address changed. */
}

void ip_address_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

   /* Set the ip address change notify of IP instance. */
   status = nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify (&ip_0, ip_address_change_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the ip address change notify of IP
   instance was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5536">IPv6 adresini Sil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5536">Delete IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5538">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5539">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneğinin IPv6 adresi tablosundaki belirtilen dizindeki IPv6 adresini siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5539">This service deletes the IPv6 address at the specified index in the IPv6 address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5540">NetX eşdeğeri yoktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5540">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5541">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5541">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5542">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5542">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5543">**address_index** Dizinden IP örneği IPv6 adresi tablosu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5543">**address_index** Index to IP instance IPv6 address table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5544">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) adresi başarıyla silindi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Address successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) uygun bir giden arabirim bulunamıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5550">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5551">Başlatma, Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5551">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5552">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5553">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5554">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5554">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;

/* Delete the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. */
address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_delete(&ip_0, address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5580">IPv6 adresini ve önekini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5580">Retrieve IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5581">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5581">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5582">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5582">Description</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5602">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5602">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
ULONG       prefix_length;
UINT        interface_index;

/* Get the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. If
   found, the address network interface is returned in the
   interface_index input, as well as the address prefix in the
   prefix_length input. */

address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_get(&ip_0, address_index, &ip_address,
                              &prefix_length, &interface_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span></span>

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG prefix_length,
    UINT *address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5630">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5630">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5638">**prefix_length** Adres ön ekinin uzunluğu (alt ağ maskesi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5638">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5639">**address_index** Adresin eklendiği adres tablosuna Dizin işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5639">**address_index** Pointer to the index into the address table where the address is inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5640">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 başarıyla etkinleştirildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP adresi tablosu dolu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP address table is full</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) sağlanan IP adresı bu IP örneğinde zaten kullanılıyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5653">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5653">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
UINT        interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                     IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                     0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                     pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* Set the IPv6 address (a global address as indicated by the 64 bit
   prefix) using the IPv6 address just created on the primary device
   (index zero). The index into the address table is returned in
   address_index. */
interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&ip_0, interface_index, &ip_address,
                              64,&address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IPv6 address is
   successfully assigned to the primary interface (interface 0). */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5679">Varsayılan yönlendirici tablosuna bir IPv6 yönlendiricisi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5679">Add an IPv6 Router to Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5680">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5680">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG router_lifetime,
    UINT index_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5681">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5682">Bu hizmet, belirtilen fiziksel arabirime varsayılan yönlendirici tablosuna bir IPv6 varsayılan yönlendiricisi ekler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5682">This service adds an IPv6 default router on the specified physical interface to the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5683">Eşdeğer NetX IPv4 hizmeti ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5683">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5684">*router_address* geçerli bir IPv6 adresine işaret etmelidir ve yönlendiricinin belirtilen fiziksel arabirimden doğrudan erişilebilir olması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5684">*router_address* must point to a valid IPv6 address, and the router must be directly accessible from the specified physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5685">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5686">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5686">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5687">**router_address** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde varsayılan yönlendirici adresine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5687">**router_address** Pointer to the default router address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5688">**router_lifetime** Varsayılan yönlendirici yaşam süresi (saniye).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5688">**router_lifetime** Default router life time, in seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5689">Geçerli değerler:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5689">Valid values are:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5690">**0xFFFF:** Zaman aşımı yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5690">**0xFFFF:** No time out</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Saniye cinsinden zaman aşımı değeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Timeout value, in seconds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5692">**index_index** Yönlendirici üzerinden erişilebileceği ağ dizini dizini için geçerli bellek konumuna işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5692">**index_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the network index index through which the router can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5693">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5693">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) varsayılan yönlendirici başarıyla eklendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) varsayılan yönlendirici tablosunda daha fazla girdi yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries available in the default router table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IPv6 adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) geçerli IPv6 adresi girişi değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği veya depolama alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz yönlendirici arabirimi dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5702">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5703">Başlatma, Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5703">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5704">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5704">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5705">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5705">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5706">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5706">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds a default router for the primary interface at
   fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac to the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version   = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Set the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Set IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(ip_ptr, &router_address,
                                     0xFFFF, PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* Unless invalid pointer input is detected by the error checking
   Service, status return is always NX_SUCCESS. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5741">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5741">Example</span></span>

```c
/*This example removes a default router:fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac */

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router_address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Program the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Delete the IPv6 default router. */
nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete(ip_ptr, &router_address);
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5763">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5763">Prototype</span></span>

    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT entry_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_addr,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    ULONG *configuration_method);

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5797">Varsayılan yönlendirici tablosundan bir IPv6 yönlendiricisi al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5797">Retrieve an IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5798">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5798">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5799">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5800">Bu hizmet, varsayılan yönlendirici tablosundan belirtilen fiziksel arabirimdeki IPv6 varsayılan yönlendirici adresini, yaşam süresini ve ön ek uzunluğunu alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5800">This service retrieves an IPv6 default router address, lifetime and prefix length on the specified physical interface from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5801">Eşdeğer NetX IPv4 hizmeti, \*\**nx_ip_gateway_address_get *.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5801">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5802">*router_address* geçerli bir NXD_ADDRESS yapısına işaret etmelidir, bu nedenle bu hizmet varsayılan yönlendiricinin IPv6 adresini doldurabilirler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5802">*router_address* must point to a valid NXD_ADDRESS structure, so this service can fill in the IPv6 address of the default router.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5803">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5804">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5804">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5805">**interface_index** Yönlendiricinin erişebileceği ağ arabirimine olan Dizin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5805">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the router is accessible through</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5806">**router_address** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde varsayılan yönlendirici adresinin dönüş değeri için depolama alanı işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5806">**router_address** Pointer to the storage space for the return value of the default router address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5807">**router_lifetime** Yönlendirici ömrü işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5807">**router_lifetime** Pointer to the router lifetime</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5808">**prefix_length** Yönlendirici adresi önek uzunluğu işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5808">**prefix_length** Pointer to the router address prefix length</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5809">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) varsayılan yönlendirici başarıyla eklendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) varsayılan yönlendirici bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Default router not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz yönlendirici arabirimi dizini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği veya depolama alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5816">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5816">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5817">Başlatma, Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5817">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5818">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5818">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5819">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5819">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5820">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5820">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example retrieves a default router for the primary device
   from the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;
ULONG       router_lifetime;
ULONG       prefix_length;

/* Get IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(ip_ptr, PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     &router_address,
                                     &router_lifetime,
                                     &prefix_length);

/* If status returns NX_SUCCESS, the router address and related
   information is returned successfully. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5863">IPv6 özelliğini devre dışı bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5863">Disable the IPv6 feature</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5864">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5864">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5865">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5866">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP örneği için IPv6 'Yı devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5866">This service disables the IPv6 for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5867">Ayrıca, varsayılan yönlendirici tablosu, ND önbelleği ve IPv6 adresi tablosunu da temizler, tüm çok noktaya yayın gruplarını bırakır ve Yönlendirici isteme değişkenlerini sıfırlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5867">It also clears the default router table, ND cache and IPv6 address table, leaves the all multicast groups, and resets the router solicitation variables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5868">IPv6 etkinleştirilmemişse bu hizmetin hiçbir etkisi yoktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5868">This service has no effect if IPv6 is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5869">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5870">**ip_ptr** IP örnek işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5870">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5871">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5871">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı devre dışı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4b) IPv6 modülü derlenmedi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) IPv6 module is not compiled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5877">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5877">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5878">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5878">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5879">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5879">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5880">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5881">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5881">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IPv6 feature on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables IPv6 feature on IP instance.*/
```
