## <a name="nxd_ipv6_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5907">IPv6 hizmetlerini etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5907">Enable IPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5908">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5908">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5909">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5909">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5910">Bu hizmet IPv6 Hizmetleri 'ni sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5910">This service enables IPv6 services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5911">IPv6 hizmetleri etkinleştirildiğinde, IP örneği tüm düğüm çok noktaya yayın grubuna (FF02:: 1) katılır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5911">When the IPv6 services are enabled, the IP instance joins the all-node multicast group (FF02::1).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5912">Bu hizmet, bağlantı yerel adresini veya genel adresini ayarladı.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5912">This service does not set the link local address or global address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5913">Uygulamalar, cihaz ağ adreslerini yapılandırmak için *nxd_ipv6_address_set* kullanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5913">Applications should use *nxd_ipv6_address_set* to configure the device network addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5914">NetX eşdeğeri yoktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5914">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5915">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5915">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5916">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5916">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5917">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5917">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 başarıyla etkinleştirildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 zaten etkin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 is already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5923">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5924">Başlatma, Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5924">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5925">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5925">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5926">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5926">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5927">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5927">Example</span></span>

```c
/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                      pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for IPv6 services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5953">IPv6 çok noktaya yayın grubuna ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5953">Join an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5954">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5954">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5955">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5956">Bu hizmet, bir uygulamanın belirli bir ağ arabirimindeki belirli bir IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresine katılmasına olanak sağlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5956">This service allows an application to join a specific IPv6 multicast address on a specific network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5957">Bağlantı sürücüsüne çok noktaya yayın adresini eklemek için bildirim gönderilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5957">The link driver is notified to add the multicast address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5958">NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** seçeneği ile derlenip bu hizmet kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5958">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5959">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5959">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5960">**ip_ptr** IP örnek işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5960">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5961">**group_address** IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5961">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5962">**interface_index** Çok noktaya yayın grubuyla ilişkili ağ arabirimine olan Dizin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5962">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with the multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5963">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5963">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresinde almaya başarıyla izin verebilir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables receiving on IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) IPv6 çok noktaya yayın tablosunda daha fazla girdi yok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries in the IPv6 multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) cihaz sürücüsünde daha fazla grup adresi yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) No more group addresses available in the device driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği veya IPv6 çok noktaya yayın özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IPv6 adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5975">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5976">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5976">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Join multicast group on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(&ip_0,
                                           &group_address,
                                           PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has joined the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5989">IPv6 çok noktaya yayın grubu bırakma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5989">Leave an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5990">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5991">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5992">Bu hizmet belirli bir ağ cihazından belirli IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresini kaldırır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5992">This service removes the specific IPv6 multicast address from the specific network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5993">Bağlantı sürücüsüne IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresinin kaldırılması da bildirilir. NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** seçeneği ile derlenip bu hizmet kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5993">The link driver is also notified of the removal of the IPv6 multicast address.This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5994">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5994">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5995">**ip_ptr** IP örnek işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5995">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5996">**group_address** IPv6 çok noktaya yayın adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5996">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5997">**interface_index** Grupla ilişkili ağ arabirimine olan Dizin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5997">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5998">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5998">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı çok noktaya yayın bırakma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) girdisi bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği veya IPv6 çok noktaya yayın özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz IPv6 adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6005">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6005">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6007">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6007">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6008">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6008">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6009">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6009">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6010">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6010">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Leave multicast address on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(&ip_0,
                                            &group_address,
                                            primary_interface);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has left the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6024">Durum bilgisiz adresini devre dışı bırak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6024">Disable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6025">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6025">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6026">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6027">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ cihazında IPv6 durum bilgisiz adresi otomatik yapılandırma özelliğini devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6027">This service disables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6028">IPv6 adresi yapılandırılmışsa, hiçbir etkisi yoktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6028">It has no effect if the IPv6 address has been configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6029">NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** seçeneği ile derlenip bu hizmet kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6029">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6030">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6031">**ip_ptr** IP örnek işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6031">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6032">**interface_index** IPv6 durum bilgisiz adresi otomatik yapılandırması devre dışı olması gereken ağ arabiriminin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6032">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6033">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6033">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) durum bilgisiz Adres Oto Yapılandırma özelliğini başarıyla devre dışı bırakır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disables stateless address autoconfigure feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği veya IPv6 durum bilgisi içermeyen adres otomatik yapılandırma özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6039">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6040">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6040">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6041">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6041">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6042">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6042">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6043">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6043">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Disable stateless address auto configuration on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(&ip_0,
                                                       PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6069">Durum bilgisiz adresi otomatik yapılandırmasını etkinleştir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6069">Enable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6070">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6071">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6072">Bu hizmet, belirtilen ağ cihazında IPv6 durum bilgisiz adresi otomatik yapılandırma özelliğini sunar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6072">This service enables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6073">NetX Duo kitaplığı tanımlı ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** seçeneği ile derlenip bu hizmet kullanılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6073">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6074">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6074">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6075">**ip_ptr** IP örnek işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6075">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6076">**interface_index** IPv6 durum bilgisiz adresi otomatik yapılandırması 'nın etkinleştirilmesi gereken ağ arabiriminin dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6076">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6077">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6077">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) durum bilgisiz adresi otomatik yapılandırma özelliği başarıyla etkinleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables stateless address autoconfig feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) zaten etkin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği veya IPv6 durum bilgisi içermeyen adres otomatik yapılandırma özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değildir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) arabirim dizini geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP denetimi blok işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6084">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6085">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6085">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6086">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6086">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6087">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6087">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6088">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6088">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE

/* Enable stateless address auto configuration on this
   IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(&ip_0,
                                                      PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, enables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6114">Komşu önbelleğindeki IPv6 adresi girişini sil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6114">Delete IPv6 Address entry in the Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6115">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6115">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6116">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6117">Bu hizmet, sağlanan IP adresi için bir IPv6 komşu bulma önbelleği girişi siler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6117">This service deletes an IPv6 neighbor discovery cache entry for the supplied IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6118">Eşdeğer NetX IPv4 işlevi ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6118">The equivalent NetX IPv4 function is ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6119">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6120">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6121">**ip_address** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde Silinecek IPv6 adresine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6121">**ip_address** Pointer to IPv6 address to delete, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6122">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) adresi başarıyla sildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) adres IPv6 komşu önbelleğinde bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Address not found in the IPv6 neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği veya depolama alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6128">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6128">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6129">Başlatma, iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6129">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6130">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6130">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6131">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6131">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6132">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6132">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example deletes an entry from the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Delete an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified IPv6
   address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(&ip_0,
                                   &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was deleted from the neighbor cache
   table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6150">Komşu önbelleğine bir IPv6 adresi/MAC eşlemesi ekleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6150">Add an IPv6 Address/MAC Mapping to Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6151">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6151">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_ip,
    UINT interface_index, 
    char *mac);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6152">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6152">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6153">Bu hizmet, belirtilen IP adresi için komşu bulma önbelleğine bir giriş ekler *ip_address* belirtilen ağ arabirimi dizinindeki (interface_index) donanım MAC adresiyle eşleştirilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6153">This service adds an entry to the neighbor discovery cache for the specified IP address *ip_address* mapped to the hardware MAC address on the specified network interface index (interface_index).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6154">Eşdeğer NetX IPv4 hizmeti ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6154">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6155">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6155">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6156">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6156">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6157">**dest_ip** IPv6 adres örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6157">**dest_ip** Pointer to IPv6 address instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6158">**interface_index** Hedef IPv6 adresine erişilebildiği fiziksel ağ arabirimini belirten Dizin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6158">**interface_index** Index specifying physical network interface where the destination IPv6 address can be reached</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6159">**Mac** Donanım adresi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6159">**mac** Pointer to hardware address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6160">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6160">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) girdisi başarıyla eklendi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) geçersiz önbellek veya kullanılabilir komşu önbellek girişi yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Invalid cache or no neighbor cache entries available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği veya depolama alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz arabirim dizin değeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index value.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6167">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6168">Başlatma, Iş parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6168">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6169">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6169">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6170">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6170">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6171">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6171">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds an entry on the primary network interface to
   the neighbor cache table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTEFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UCHAR hw_address[6] = {0x0, 0xcf,0x01,0x02, 0x03, 0x04};
CHAR  *mac;

mac = (CHAR *)&hw_address[0];

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Create an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified
   IPv6 address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(&ip_0,
                                &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0],
                                PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mac);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was added to the neighbor
   cache table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6189">IPv6 adresi için donanım adresini bulma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6189">Locate Hardware Address for an IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6190">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6190">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6191">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6192">Bu hizmet, sağlanan IPv6 adresiyle ilişkilendirilen IPv6 komşusu bulma önbelleğinde fiziksel bir donanım adresi bulmaya çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6193">İnterface_index parametreye ulaşılmış olabilecek ağ arabiriminin dizini de döndürülür *.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6194">Eşdeğer NetX IPv4 hizmeti ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6195">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6195">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6196">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6196">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6197">**ip_address** Bulunacak IP adresi işaretçisi, ana bilgisayar bayt sıralaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6197">**ip_address** Pointer to IP address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6198">**physical_msw** Fiziksel adresin, ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde en iyi 16 bit (47-32) işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6198">**physical_msw** Pointer to the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6199">**physical_lsw** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde fiziksel adresin düşük 32 bitleri (31-0) işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6199">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6200">**interface_index** IPv6 adresinin erişilebileceği ağ cihazını belirten arabirim dizini için geçerli bellek konumuna yönelik işaretçi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6200">**interface_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the interface index specifying the network device on which the IPv6 address can be reached.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6201">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) adresi başarıyla buldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) eşleme, komşu önbelleğinde değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping not in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) sağlanan IP adresi 6. sürümde değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) The supplied IP address is not version 6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği veya depolama alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6208">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6209">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6209">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6210">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6210">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6211">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6211">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6212">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6232">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6232">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6233">Bu hizmet IPv6 komşu bulma önbelleğinin tamamını geçersiz kılar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6233">This service invalidates the entire IPv6 neighbor discovery cache.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6234">Bu hizmet, ICMPv6 etkinleştirildikten önce veya sonra çağrılabilir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6234">This service can be invoked either before or after ICMPv6 has been enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6235">Bu hizmet IPv4 bağlantısı için geçerli değildir, bu nedenle NetX eşdeğeri hizmet yoktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6235">This service is not applicable to IPv4 connectivity, so there is no NetX equivalent service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6265">Fiziksel bir adres için IPv6 adresini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6265">Retrieve IPv6 Address for a Physical Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6267">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6268">Bu hizmet, sağlanan fiziksel adresle ilişkili IPv6 komşu bulma önbelleğinde bir IPv6 adresi bulmaya çalışır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6269">Komşunuzun ulaşılbileceği ağ arabiriminin dizini de döndürülür.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6270">Eşdeğer NetX IPv4 hizmeti ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6271">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6271">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6272">**ip_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan IP örneğine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6272">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6273">**ip_address** Geçerli NXD_ADDRESS yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6274">**physical_msw** Bulunacak fiziksel adresin ilk 16 bit (47-32), ana bilgisayar bayt sıralaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6275">**physical_lsw** Bulunacak fiziksel adresin düşük 32 bitleri (31-0), ana bilgisayar bayt sıralaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6276">**interface_index** IPv6 adresine erişilebileceği ağ aygıtı dizinine yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6277">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) adresi başarıyla buldu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) fiziksel adres, komşu önbelleğinde bulunamadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4b) IPv6 özelliği NETX Duo kitaplığında yerleşik değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz IP örneği veya depolama alanı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC adresi sıfırdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6284">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6285">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6285">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6286">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6287">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6288">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6306">TCP bağlantısı oluşturma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6307">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6308">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6309">Bu hizmet, önceden oluşturulmuş bir TCP istemci yuvasını belirtilen sunucunun bağlantı noktasına kullanarak TCP bağlantısı yapar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6310">Bu hizmet, IPv4 veya IPv6 ağlarında çalışmaktadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6311">Geçerli TCP sunucusu bağlantı noktaları 0 ile 0xFFFF arasındadır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6312">NetX Duo, sunucu IP adresine göre uygun fiziksel arabirimi belirler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6313">NetX IPv4 eşdeğeri ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6314">Yuva bir yerel bağlantı noktası ile bağlantılı olmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6315">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6316">**socket_ptr** Daha önce oluşturulan TCP yuvasına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6317">**server_ip** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde IPv4 veya IPv6 hedef adresi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6318">**SERVER_PORT** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde Bağlanılacak sunucu bağlantı noktası numarası (1 ila 0xFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6319">**wait_option** Bağlantı kurulurken bekle seçeneği.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6320">Bekleme seçenekleri aşağıdaki gibi tanımlanır:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xffffffff)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6323">**ticks içinde zaman aşımı değeri** (0x00000001-0xfffffffe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6324">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı yuva bağlantısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) askıya alma isteği tx_thread_wait_abort bir çağrı tarafından iptal edildi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz sunucu IPv4 veya IPv6 adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva bağlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) yuva kapalı durumda değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) hiçbir bekleme belirtilmedi, bağlantı girişimi devam ediyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) geçersiz arabirim dizini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) ağ arabiriminin geçerli bir IPv6 adresi yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) geçersiz bağlantı noktası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) bağlantı başarısız olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6342">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6367">Eş TCP yuvası IP adresini ve bağlantı noktası numarasını alır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6368">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6369">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6370">Bu hizmet, bağlı TCP yuvasının eş IP adresini ve bağlantı noktası bilgilerini IPv4 veya IPv6 ağı üzerinden alır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6371">Eşdeğer NetX IPv4 hizmeti ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6372">*Socket_ptr* , zaten bağlı durumda olan bir TCP yuvasına işaret etmelidir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6373">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6374">**socket_ptr** Eş konağa bağlı TCP yuvası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6375">**peer_ip_address** IPv4 veya IPv6 eş adresi işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6376">Döndürülen IP adresi ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6377">**peer_port** Eş bağlantı noktası numarası işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6378">Döndürülen bağlantı noktası numarası ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6379">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) yuva bilgileri başarıyla alındı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) yuva eşe bağlı değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz işaretçi girişi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6385">İzin verilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6386">İş Parçacıkları</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6387">Önalım mümkün</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6388">Hayır</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6389">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6414">UDP paketindeki ağ parametrelerini Ayıkla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6415">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6416">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6417">Bu hizmet, IPv4 veya IPv6 UDP ağlarında alınan bir paketten ağ parametrelerini ayıklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6418">NetX eşdeğeri hizmeti ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6419">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6419">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6458">UDP veri birimi gönder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6459">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6460">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6461">Bu hizmet, IPv4 veya IPv6 ağları için önceden oluşturulmuş ve bağlantılı bir UDP yuvası aracılığıyla bir UDP datagramı gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6462">NetX Duo, hedef IP adresini temel alarak kaynak adresi olarak uygun bir yerel IP adresi bulur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6463">Belirli bir arabirim ve kaynak IP adresi belirtmek için, uygulamanın ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** hizmetini kullanması gerekir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6464">Bu hizmetin UDP veri biriminin başarıyla gönderilip gönderilmediğini ne olursa olsun, hemen geri dönmediğine unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6465">NetX (IPv4) eşdeğeri hizmeti ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6466">Yuva yerel bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6467">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6468">**socket_ptr** Önceden oluşturulan UDP yuva örneği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6468">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP veri birimi paket işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6470">**ip_address** Hedef IPv4 veya IPv6 adresi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6470">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6471">**bağlantı noktası** Ana bilgisayar bayt düzeninde geçerli hedef bağlantı noktası numarası 1 ile 0xFFFF arasında)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6471">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6472">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı UDP yuvası gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) geçersiz sunucu IPv4 veya IPv6 adresi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva herhangi bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) uygun bir giden arabirim bulunamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) paketteki UDP üst bilgisi için yeterli yer yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) paket ekleme işaretçisi geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi, adres işaretçisi veya paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address pointer, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) bağlantı noktası numarası geçerli bir Aralık içinde değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6487">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6513">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6514">Bu hizmet, IPv4 veya IPv6 ağları için önceden oluşturulmuş ve bağlantılı bir UDP yuvası aracılığıyla bir UDP datagramı gönderir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6515">*Address_index* parametresi, giden paket için kullanılacak kaynak IP adresini belirtir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6516">İşlevin, UDP veri biriminin başarıyla gönderilip gönderilmediğini ne olursa olsun, hemen döndürdüğüne unutmayın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6517">Yuva yerel bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmalıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6518">NetX (IPv4) eşdeğeri hizmeti ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6519">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6520">**socket_ptr** Önceden oluşturulan UDP yuva örneği işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6520">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP veri birimi paket işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6522">**ip_address** Hedef IPv4 veya IPv6 adresi bağlantı noktası işaretçisi 1 ile 0xFFFF arasında geçerli hedef bağlantı noktası numarası, ana bilgisayar bayt sıralaması</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6522">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address port Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6523">**address_index** Paket için kullanılacak kaynak adresini belirten Dizin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6523">**address_index** Index specifying the source address to use for the packet</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı UDP yuvası gönderme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) yuva herhangi bir bağlantı noktasına bağlanmadı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) uygun bir giden arabirim bulunamıyor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi, adresi veya paket işaretçisi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address, or packet pointer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP etkin değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) bağlantı noktası numarası geçerli Aralık içinde değil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within valid range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) belirtilen ağ arabirimi geçerli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) paketteki UDP üst bilgisi için yeterli yer yok</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) paket ekleme işaretçisi geçersiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
