### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6541">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6565">UPD paket kaynak bilgilerini al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6566">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6567">Açıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6568">Bu hizmet, kaynak IP adresini ve bağlantı noktası numarasını ana bilgisayar UDP yuvası aracılığıyla alınan bir UDP paketinden ayıklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6569">NetX (IPv4) eşdeğeri ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6570">Parametreler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6571">**packet_ptr** Alınan UDP paketi işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6572">**ip_address** Paket kaynağı IP adresini depolamak için NXD_ADDRESS yapısına yönelik işaretçi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6573">**bağlantı noktası** UDP yuva bağlantı noktası numarası işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6574">Dönüş Değerleri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) başarılı kaynak ayıklama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) paketi geçerli değil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) geçersiz yuva işaretçisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Bu hizmet için geçersiz çağrı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d2ed-6583">Örnek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d2ed-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
